<span>Property privacy description. One of <code>"private_room"</code>, <code>"shared_room"</code> or <code>"entire_home"</code>. </span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>bedrooms</code> <br> <i>integer</i> <br></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Number of bedrooms. 0 denotes a studio apartment.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>bathrooms</code> <br> <i>float</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Number of bathrooms with a .5 granularity, e.g., 1.5, 2.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>beds</code> <br> <i>integer</i> <br></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Number of beds.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>amenity_categories</code> <br> <i>array of strings</i> <br></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Amenity array. One of <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#amenity-strings">supported strings.</a></span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>check_in_option</code> <br><i>object</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Describes how guests will check in. See Checkin Option Object below.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>requested_approval_status_category</code> <br> <i>string</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Listing’s Airbnb review status. Can be “<code>new</code>”, “<code>ready for review</code>”, “<code>approved</code>” or “<code>rejected</code>”. </span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>has_availability</code> <br> <i>boolean</i> <br></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Whether the listing is listed or not.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>permit_or_tax_id</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The local permit or tax ID.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>apt</code> <br> <i>string</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Apartment/Unit. E.g: "Apt 32"</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>street</code> <br> <i>string</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Street address. Should include number, street name, and street suffix.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>city</code> <br> <i>string</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>City</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>state</code> <br> <i>string</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>State</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>zipcode</code><br> <i>string</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Zipcode</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>country_code</code><br> <i>string</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Listing's two-letter country code. Format: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1">ISO 3166-1</a></span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>lat</code> <br> <i>float</i> (9.6)</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Latitude.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>lng</code> <br> <i>float</i> (9.6)</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Longitude.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>user_defined_location</code> <br> <i>boolean</i> <br></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Set this field to <code>true</code> if providing <code>lat</code> and <code>lng</code> coordinates.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>directions</code> <br> <i>string</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Directions for confirmed guests. Directions are private and only shared with guests after a reservation is confirmed.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>person_capacity</code> <br> <i>integer</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Maximum number of guests that can be accommodated.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_currency</code> <br> <i>string</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Currency used for setting listing price. One of <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#supported-currencies">supported strings</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_price</code> <br> <i>integer</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Listing's base nightly price. Price is in <code>listing_currency</code> currency.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>synchronization_category</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The synchronization category the user has chosen for this listing. One of <code>"sync_all"</code>, <code>"sync_rates_and_availability"</code>, <code>"sync_undecided"</code> or <code>null</code>. See <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#sync-categories">Sync Categories</a> for more details.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>bathroom_shared</code> <br> <i>boolean</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Is the bathroom shared? Ignore for <code>"entire_home"</code> listings.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>bathroom_shared_with_category</code> <br> <i>array of strings</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Who is the bathroom shared with? One or more from <code>"host"</code>, <code>"family_friends_roommates"</code>, <code>"other_guests"</code>. Ignore for <code>"entire_home"</code> listings. </span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>common_spaces_shared</code> <br> <i>boolean</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Are the common spaces shared? Not applicable for <code>"entire_home"</code> listings.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>common_spaces_shared_with_category</code> <br> <i>array of strings</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Who are the common spaces shared with? One or more from <code>"host"</code>, <code>"family_friends_roommates"</code>, <code>"other_guests"</code>. Ignore for <code>"entire_home"</code> listings.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>total_inventory_count</code><br><i>integer</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span><b>Room Type inventory only.</b> The total amount of rooms of a certain room type.<br>For more information about room types, see the <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#room-type-inventory">Room Type Inventory section</a> of the Appendix.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>property_external_id</code><br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span><b>Room Type inventory only. </b>A string indicating which property current listing belongs to. This id can be the property's id on PMS platform; the id for each property should be unique. For more information about room types, see the <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#room-type-inventory">Room Type Inventory section</a> of the Appendix.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<p><b>Checkin Option Object</b></p>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>category</code> <br> <i>string</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The type of check in the host offers. Must one of <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#check-in-option-types">supported strings</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>instruction</code> <br> <i>string</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The instructions for guests on how to checkin. Only shared with confirmed guests.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<p><b>Deprecated Fields</b></p>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>bed_type_category</code> <br> <i>string</i><br>[DEPRECATED]</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>User Listing Rooms API instead. Bed type. Must be from list of <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#bed-types">supported strings</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>check_in_time</code> <br> <i>integer</i><br>[DEPRECATED]</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>User Booking Settings API instead. Earliest time the guest can check in, indicated as hour between <code>8-24</code>, or <code>-1</code> for flexible check-in.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>check_in_time_ends_at</code> <br> <i>integer</i><br>[DEPRECATED]</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>User Booking Settings API instead. Latest time the guest can check in, indicated as hour between 8-26 (note: 25 and 26 are 1am and 2am for the <b>next</b> day, respectively) or -1 for flexible end time.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>check_out_time</code> <br> <i>integer</i><br>[DEPRECATED]</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>User Booking Settings API instead. The check-out hour of the listing, from 0-23. Examples: 0 (midnight), 1 (1am), 13 (1pm). A value outside the 0-23 range results in a flexible check-out time.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>min_nights_input_value</code> <br> <i>integer</i><br>[DEPRECATED]</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Use Availability Rules API instead. Minimum number of nights allowed for a reservation. </span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>max_nights_input_value</code> <br> <i>integer</i><br>[DEPRECATED]</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Use Availability Rules API instead. Maximum number of nights allowed for a reservation. </span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>cancellation_policy_category</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br>[DEPRECATED]</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Use Booking Settings API instead. Listing's cancellation policy. One of <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#cancellation-policies">supported strings</a>. </span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_weekend_price</code> <br> <i>integer</i><br>[DEPRECATED]</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Use Pricing Settings API instead. Weekend price per night. If specified, this price is applied to every Friday and Saturday for this listing. Price is in <code>listing_currency</code> currency.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_weekly_price</code> <br> <i>integer</i><br>[DEPRECATED]</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Use Pricing Settings API instead. Listing's discounted weekly price. Price is in <code>listing_currency</code> currency.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_monthly_price</code> <br> <i>integer</i><br>[DEPRECATED]</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Use Pricing Settings API instead. If set, this price applies to any reservation 28 nights or longer. Price is in <code>listing_currency</code> currency.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_security_deposit</code> <br> <i>integer</i><br>[DEPRECATED]</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Use Pricing Settings API instead. A security deposit held by Airbnb and refunded to the guest unless you make claim within 48 hours of guest checkout.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_cleaning_fee</code> <br> <i>integer</i><br>[DEPRECATED]</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Use Pricing Settings API instead. Cleaning fee, denoted in <code>listing_currency </code>currency. Maximum  cleaning fee is (USD $600 + 25% nightly price).</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>guests_included</code> <br> <i>integer</i><br>[DEPRECATED]</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Use Pricing Settings API instead. Number of guests permitted without any additional fees. </span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_extra_person_price</code> <br> <i>integer</i><br>[DEPRECATED]</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Use Pricing Settings API instead. Amount added to the listing's nightly price  for each guest beyond the number specified in <code>guests_included</code>. </span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>instant_book_welcome_message</code> <br> <i>string</i><br>[DEPRECATED]</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span> Use Booking Settings API instead. Paragraph for Hosts to Introduce themselves and ask for the things that are important for them to know, like the purpose of the guest's trip and their check-in time. Guests are asked to respond to this when they book.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>localized_extra_person_price<br>localized_monthly_price<br>localized_cleaning_fee<br>localized_weekend_price<br>localized_price<br>localized_security_deposit<br>localized_weekly_price</code><br>[DEPRECATED]</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Localized fields are dynamically generated specific to the locale of the requesting user. Please stop using these fields as they don’t provide any useful information.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_descriptions</code><br>[DEPRECATED]</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Please stop using this field and refer to the <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#listing-descriptions-api">Listing Descriptions </a>API.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>picture_url<br>picture_urls<br>medium_url<br>xl_picture_url<br>xl_picture_urls<br>thumbnail_url<br>thumbnail_urls</code><br>[DEPRECATED]</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Please stop using this field and refer to the<a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#photos-api"> Photos </a>API.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>

sections.name: Listing Descriptions API
sections.content:
<p>The <code>/listing_descriptions</code> API lets you create or update a listing’s descriptions. </p>
<p>Accurate and informative property descriptions attract guests and improve their satisfaction.</p>
<p>You can create different descriptions for different locales. For example, you may want to create your own descriptions for both English and French. If you do not do this, guests in different locales (e.g., France) are shown a machine-translated description.</p>

sections.name: Creating or Updating a Description
sections.content:
<p>Create or update a listing description in the given locale for a listing with a given ID. See <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#supported-locales">supported locales</a>.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>PUT /v2/listing_descriptions/:listing_id/:locale</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-url-ids">Request URL IDs</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code><br><i>integer</i><br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Listing ID</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>locale</code><br><i>string</i><br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The locale for this translation. See <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#supported-locales">supported locales</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="request-body-parameters-3">Request Body Parameters</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>name</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br> <u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Listing title.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>summary</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br> <u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Property summary. Should cover the major features of the space and neighborhood in 500 characters or less.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>space</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br> <u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Space information: what makes it unique, and how many people does it comfortably fit.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>access</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br> <u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Information about what parts of the space the guests will be able to access.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>interaction</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br> <u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>How much the Host will interact with the guests, and if the Host will be present during the guest stay.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>neighborhood_overview</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br> <u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Information about the neighborhood and surrounding region. Suggestions about what guests should experience &amp; do.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>transit</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br> <u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Information on getting to the property. Is there convenient public transit? Is parking included with the listing or nearby? How does the guest get to the listing from the airport?</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>notes</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br> <u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Any additional details for the guest to know.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>house_rules</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br> <u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Instructions for guests on how to behave. Should also include whether pets are allowed and if there are rules about smoking.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="response-5">Response</h5>
<p>A <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#description-object">Description Object</a></p>
<h5 id="example-request-6">Example Request</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"PUT"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_descriptions/1955643/en"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 8uaxi4r1busbeg21fuacga40c"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: av8mf8kd4k40fq26xxd9w4p44"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -d <span class="s1">'{
    "name": "SOMA, 5 Min Walk to Moscone Center.",
    "summary": "New summary.",
    "space": "New space.",
    "access": "New access.",
    "interaction": "New interaction.",
    "neighborhood_overview": "New neigborhood_overview.",
    "transit": "New transit.",
    "notes": "New notes.",
    "house_rules": "New house_rules."
  }'</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-2">Example Response</h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
   </span><span class="nt">"listing_description"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1955643</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"locale"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"en"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"name"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"SOMA, 5 Min Walk to Moscone Center"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"description"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New space. New access. New interaction. New neigborhood_overview. New transit. New notes."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"summary"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New summary."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"space"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New space."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"access"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New access."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"interaction"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New interaction."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"neighborhood_overview"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New neigborhood_overview."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"transit"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New transit."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"notes"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New notes."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"house_rules"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New houese_rules."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"machine_translated"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">false</span><span class="w">
   </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Retrieving a Description
sections.content:
<p>You can use this endpoint to get a listing's description. A machine-translated description is returned if you haven't set a description for that locale.</p>
<p>This endpoint requires that you pass a <code>listing_id</code> and <code>locale</code> as URL parameters.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>GET /v2/listing_descriptions/:listing_id/:locale</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-url-ids-2">Request URL IDs</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code><br><i>integer</i><br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Listing ID</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>locale</code><br><i>string</i><br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The locale of this response/translation. See <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#supported-locales">supported locales</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="response-6">Response</h5>
<p>A <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#description-object">Description Object</a></p>
<h5 id="example-request-7">Example Request</h5>
<p>When there is a human-created description:</p>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"GET"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_descriptions/1955643/en"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 8uaxi4r1busbeg21fuacga40c"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: av8mf8kd4k40fq26xxd9w4p44"</span> <span class="se">\</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-3">Example Response </h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"listing_description"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"name"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"SOMA, 5 Min Walk to Moscone Center"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"description"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New space. New access. New interaction. New neigborhood_overview. New transit. New notes."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"summary"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New summary."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"space"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New space."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"access"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New access."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"interaction"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New interaction."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"neighborhood_overview"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New neigborhood_overview."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"transit"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New transit."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"notes"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New notes."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"house_rules"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New houese_rules."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"machine_translated"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"locale"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"en"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1955643</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="example-request-8">Example Request<b> </b>
</h5>
<p>When there is no human-created description:</p>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"GET"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_descriptions/1955643/fr"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 8uaxi4r1busbeg21fuacga40c"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: av8mf8kd4k40fq26xxd9w4p44"</span> <span class="se">\</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-4">Example Response</h5>
<p>Please note that the <code>machine_translated</code> field is set to <code>true</code>, and all the description fields are <code>null</code></p>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"listing_description"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"name"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"description"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"Nouvel espace. Nouvel accès. New interaction. New neigborhood_overview. De transit New. Nouvelles notes."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"summary"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"space"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"access"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"interaction"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"neighborhood_overview"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"transit"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"notes"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"house_rules"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"machine_translated"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"locale"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"fr"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1955643</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Retrieving all Descriptions
sections.content:
<p>This endpoint gets all the descriptions for a given listing that are not machine-translated.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>GET /v2/listing_descriptions/?listing_id=:listing_id</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-url-parameters-2">Request URL Parameters</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code><br><i>integer</i><br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Listing ID</span><br>
</td>
</tr></tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="response-7">Response</h5>
<p>A <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#description-object">Description Object </a>Array</p>
<h5 id="example-request-9">Example Request</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"GET"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_descriptions/?listing_id=1955643"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 8uaxi4r1busbeg21fuacga40c"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: av8mf8kd4k40fq26xxd9w4p44"</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-5">Example Response</h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"listing_descriptions"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"name"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"SOMA, 5 Min Walk to Moscone Center"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"description"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New space. New access. New interaction. New neigborhood_overview. ew transit. New notes."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"summary"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New summary."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"space"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New space."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"access"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New access."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"interaction"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New interaction."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"neighborhood_overview"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New neigborhood_overview."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"transit"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New transit."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"notes"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New notes."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"house_rules"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New houese_rules."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"machine_translated"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"locale"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"en"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1955643</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">]</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Deleting a Description
sections.content:
<p>Delete a listing description in the given locale for a listing with a given ID. See <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest@supported-locales">supported locales</a>.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>DELETE /v2/listing_descriptions/:listing_id/:locale</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-url-ids-3">Request URL IDs</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code><br><i>integer</i><br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Listing ID</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>locale</code><br><i>string</i><br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The locale for this translation. See <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#supported-locales">supported locales</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="response-8">Response</h5>
<p>The deleted <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#description-object">Description Object</a></p>
<h5 id="example-request-10">Example Request</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"DELETE"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_descriptions/1955643/en"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 8uaxi4r1busbeg21fuacga40c"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: av8mf8kd4k40fq26xxd9w4p44"</span> </code></pre>

sections.name: Description Object
sections.content:
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code> <br> <i>integer</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Listing ID</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>locale</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The locale of this response/translation. See <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#supported-locales">supported locales</a></span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>description</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The entire listing description. This field is not updatable and is aggregated from the following fields: <code>space</code>, <code>access</code>, <code>interaction</code>, <code>neighborhood_overview</code>, <code>transit</code>, and <code>notes</code>. If the description in the given locale is not available, this field contains machine- translated values from English.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>machine_translated</code> <br> <i>boolean</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Indicates if the response <code>description</code> field is machine translated.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>name</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Listing title.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>summary</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Property summary. Describes the space's major features and neighborhood in 500 characters or less.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>space</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Space information: what makes it unique, and how many people does it comfortably fit.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>access</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Information about what parts of the space the guests will be able to access.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>interaction</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>How much the Host will interact with the guests, and if the Host will be present during the guest stay.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>neighborhood_overview</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Information about the neighborhood and surrounding region. Suggestions about what guests should experience &amp; do.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>transit</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Information for guests on getting to the property. Is there convenient public transit? Is parking included with the listing or nearby? How does the guest get to the listing from the airport?</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>notes</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Any additional details for the guest to know.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>house_rules</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Instructions for guests on how to behave. Should also include whether pets are allowed and if there are rules about smoking.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>

sections.name: Photos API
sections.content: <p>Photos are essential to an Airbnb listing. The <code>.../listing_photos</code> API allows you to add, edit, and delete listing photos.</p>

sections.name: Uploading a Photo
sections.content:
<p>You can use this endpoint to upload a new photo associated with an existing listing. Please note, there is a<b> maximum of 200 photos</b> for each listing.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>POST /v2/listing_photos</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-body-parameters-4">Request Body Parameters</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code> <br> <i>integer</i> <br> <i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Associated listing ID.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>content_type</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br> <i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Image MIME content type. Currently supported: <code>image/jpeg</code>, <code>image/jpg</code>, <code>image/png</code> and <code>image/gif</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>filename</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br> <i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>File name. The file extension must match its content_type</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>image</code> <br> <i>base64</i> <br> <i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Image contents in base64 string format. Images cannot be larger then 25MB and are  auto-cropped</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>caption</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br> <u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Photo description.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>sort_order</code> <br> <i>integer</i> <br> <u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Determines the order of photos displayed on the listing. The photo with the lowest<code> sort_order </code>value is shown first.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="response-9">Response</h5>
<p>A <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#photo-object">Photo Object</a></p>
<h5 id="example-request-11">Example Request</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"POST"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_photos"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
     -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
     -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 62dyanvq40b1hn5yor1cviqoe"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
     -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: 5jah5juioe4rnbbd7xef5xqom"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
     -d <span class="s1">'{ "listing_id": 21321205, 
           "caption": "Living room", 
           "sort_order": 4, 
           "content_type": "image/jpeg", 
           "filename": "artLoft4.jpg", 
           "image": "'</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="k">$(</span>base64 ~/Downloads/artLoft4.jpg<span class="k">)</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="s1">'"}'</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-6">Example Response</h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"listing_photo"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">63615</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1955643</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"caption"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"Amazing photo"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"sort_order"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"extra_large_url"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"..."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"extra_medium_url"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"..."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"large_url"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"..."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"small_url"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"..."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"thumbnail_url"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"..."</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Updating a Photo
sections.content:
<p>The two photo properties you can update are <code>caption</code> and <code>sort_order</code>. This endpoint takes a Photo ID as a URL ID parameter. (Note that when you are updating your photos your listing can drop below the listing criteria standards. When this happens you must submit <code>has_availability</code> to <code>true</code> again to relist your listing on Airbnb)</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>PUT /v2/listing_photos/:photo_id</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-url-id-4">Request URL ID</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>
<span><code>photo_id</code><br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>the id of the photo</span><br>
</td>
</tr></tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="request-body-parameters-5">Request Body Parameters</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>caption</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br><u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Photo description.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>sort_order</code> <br> <i>integer</i><br><u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Determines the order of photos displayed on the listing. The photo with the lowest<code> sort_order </code>value is shown first.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="response-10">Response</h5>
<p>A <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#photo-object">Photo Object</a></p>
<h5 id="example-request-12">Example Request</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"PUT"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_photos/63615"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 8uaxi4r1busbeg21fuacga40c"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: av8mf8kd4k40fq26xxd9w4p44"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -d <span class="s1">'{
    "caption": "New Caption",
    "sort_order": 1
  }'</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-7">Example Response</h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"listing_photo"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">63615</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1955643</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"caption"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"New Caption"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"sort_order"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"extra_large_url"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"..."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"large_url"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"..."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"small_url"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"..."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"thumbnail_url"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"..."</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Retrieving a Photo
sections.content:
<p>Gets a photo with a given photo ID as a URL ID parameter.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>GET /v2/listing_photos/:photo_id</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-url-id-5"><b>Request URL ID</b></h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>
<span><code>photo_id</code><br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>the id of the photo</span><br>
</td>
</tr></tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="response-11">Response</h5>
<p>A <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#photo-object">Photo Object</a></p>
<h5 id="example-request-13">Example Request</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"GET"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_photos/63615"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 8uaxi4r1busbeg21fuacga40c"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: av8mf8kd4k40fq26xxd9w4p44"</span> <span class="se">\</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-8">Example Response</h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"listing_photo"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">63615</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1955643</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"caption"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"Amazing photo"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"sort_order"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"extra_large_url"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"..."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"extra_medium_url"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"..."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"large_url"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"..."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"small_url"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"..."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"thumbnail_url"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"..."</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Retrieving all Listing Photos
sections.content:
<p>Gets all photos for a given listing.  This API takes a Listing ID as a URL parameter.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>GET /v2/listing_photos/?listing_id=:listing_id</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-url-parameters-3">Request URL Parameters</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code><br><i>integer</i><br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Listing ID</span><br>
</td>
</tr></tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="response-12">Response</h5>
<p>A<a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#photo-object"> Photo Object </a>array</p>
<h5 id="example-request-14">Example Request</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"GET"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_photos/?listing_id=1955643"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 8uaxi4r1busbeg21fuacga40c"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: av8mf8kd4k40fq26xxd9w4p44"</span> </code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-9">Example Response</h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"listing_photos"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">63615</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1955643</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"caption"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"Amazing photo"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"sort_order"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"extra_large_url"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"..."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"large_url"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"..."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"small_url"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"..."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"thumbnail_url"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"..."</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">]</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Deleting a Photo
sections.content:
<p>Delete photo with a given photo ID as a URL ID parameter.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>DELETE /v2/listing_photos/:photo_id</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-url-id-6">Request URL ID</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>
<span><code>photo_id</code><br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>the id of the photo</span><br>
</td>
</tr></tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="example-request-15">Example Request</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"DELETE"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_photos/63615"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 8uaxi4r1busbeg21fuacga40c"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: av8mf8kd4k40fq26xxd9w4p44"</span> <span class="se">\</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Photo Object
sections.content:
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>id</code> <br><i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Photo ID</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Associated listing ID.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>caption</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Photo description</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>sort_order</code> <br> <i>integer</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>

</td>
</tr>
<tr>

<span><code>thumbnail_url</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>

</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>small_url</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>

<td>

</td>
</tr>

</td>
