</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>

sections.name: Listing Rooms API
sections.content: <p>This API lets you describe the sleeping arrangements in an Airbnb listing. It lets you add, update, retrieve and delete rooms for a listing, providing information about beds and bathrooms for each room.</p>

sections.name: Creating a room
sections.content:
<p>You can use this endpoint to describe a new room associated with an existing listing.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>POST /v2/listing_rooms</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-body-parameters-6">Request Body Parameters</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code> <br> <i>integer</i> <br> <i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Associated listing ID.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>room_number</code> <br> <i>integer</i> <br> <i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The number of the room. Use <code>0</code> for living room/common spaces and <code>1</code>, <code>2</code>, ... for bedrooms</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>beds</code> <br> <i>array of objects</i> <br> <u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>A list of beds in the room. See the list of <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#bed-types">supported bed types</a> and the Room Inventory Parameters below.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>room_amenities</code> <br> <i>array of objects</i> <br> <u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>A list of amenities in the room. See the Room Inventory Parameters below and note that only <code>"en_suite_bathroom"</code> type is currently supported.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<p><b>Room Inventory Parameters</b></p>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>type</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br> <i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The type of the inventory.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>quantity</code> <br> <i>integer</i> <br> <i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The quantity of this inventory.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="response-13">Response</h5>
<p>A <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#room-object">Room Object</a></p>
<h5 id="example-request-16">Example Request</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"POST"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_rooms"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
     -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
     -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 62dyanvq40b1hn5yor1cviqoe"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
     -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: 5jah5juioe4rnbbd7xef5xqom"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
     -d <span class="s1">'{
        "listing_id": 135432,
        "room_number": 1,
        "beds": [
          {
            "quantity": 1,
            "type": "couch"
          },
          {
            "quantity": 2,
            "type": "queen_bed"
          }
        ],
        "room_amenities": [
          {
            "quantity": 1,
            "type": "en_suite_bathroom"
          }
        ]
    }'</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-10">Example Response</h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"listing_room"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"beds"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"quantity"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"type"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"couch"</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"quantity"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"type"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"queen_bed"</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">],</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">16967830</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">23635233</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"room_amenities"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"quantity"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"type"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"en_suite_bathroom"</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">],</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"room_number"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"metadata"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Updating a Room
sections.content:
<p>You can update the bed and bathroom configurations for each room. Note that the fields not passed in the payload will not be updated.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>PUT /v2/listing_rooms/:listing_id/:room_id</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-url-id-7">Request URL ID</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code> <br> <i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Listing ID.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>room_id</code> <br> <i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Room ID.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="request-body-parameters-7">Request Body Parameters</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>beds</code> <br> <i>array of objects</i> <br> <u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>A list of beds in the room. See Room Inventory parameters above.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>room_amenities</code> <br> <i>array of objects</i> <br> <u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>A list of room amenities in the room. See Room Inventory Parameters above.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="response-14">Response</h5>
<p>A <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#room-object">Room Object</a></p>
<h5 id="example-request-17">Example Request</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"PUT"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_rooms/23635233/16967830"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 8uaxi4r1busbeg21fuacga40c"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: av8mf8kd4k40fq26xxd9w4p44"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -d <span class="s1">'{
    "beds": [
      {
        "quantity": 3,
        "type": "couch"
      }
    ],
    "room_amenities": [],
    "room_number": 1
  }'</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-11">Example Response</h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"listing_room"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"beds"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"quantity"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"type"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"couch"</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">],</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">16967830</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">23635233</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"room_amenities"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[],</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"room_number"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"metadata"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Retrieving a Room
sections.content:
<p>Gets a room with a given room ID as a URL ID parameter.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>GET /v2/listing_rooms/:listing_id/:room_id</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-url-id-8">Request URL ID</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code> <br> <i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Listing ID.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>room_id</code> <br> <i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Room ID.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="response-15">Response</h5>
<p>A <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#room-object">Room Object</a></p>
<h5 id="example-request-18">Example Request</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"GET"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_rooms/23635233/16967830"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 8uaxi4r1busbeg21fuacga40c"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: av8mf8kd4k40fq26xxd9w4p44"</span> <span class="se">\</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-12">Example Response</h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"listing_room"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"beds"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"quantity"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"type"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"couch"</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">],</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">16967830</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">23635233</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"room_amenities"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[],</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"room_number"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"metadata"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Retrieving all Listing Rooms
sections.content:
<p>Gets all rooms for a given listing.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>GET /v2/listing_rooms</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-url-parameters-4">Request URL Parameters</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code><br><i>integer</i><br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Listing ID</span><br>
</td>
</tr></tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="response-16">Response</h5>
<p>An array of<a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#room-object"> Room Objects</a></p>
<h5 id="example-request-19">Example Request</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"GET"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_rooms?listing_id=1955643"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 8uaxi4r1busbeg21fuacga40c"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: av8mf8kd4k40fq26xxd9w4p44"</span> </code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-13">Example Response</h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"listing_rooms"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"beds"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
          </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
            </span><span class="nt">"quantity"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
            </span><span class="nt">"type"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"couch"</span><span class="w">
          </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="p">],</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">16967830</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">23635233</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"room_amenities"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[],</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"room_number"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">]</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Deleting a Room
sections.content:
<p>Delete a room with a given listing ID and room ID endpoint.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>DELETE /v2/listing_rooms/:listing_id/:room_id</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-url-id-9">Request URL ID</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code> <br> <i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Listing ID.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>room_id</code> <br> <i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Room ID.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="response-17">Response</h5>
<p>The deleted <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#room-object">Room Object</a></p>
<h5 id="example-request-20">Example Request</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"DELETE"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_rooms/23635233/16967830"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 8uaxi4r1busbeg21fuacga40c"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: av8mf8kd4k40fq26xxd9w4p44"</span> <span class="se">\</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Room Object
sections.content:
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code> <br> <i>integer</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Associated listing ID.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>room_number</code> <br> <i>integer</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The number of the room. Use <code>0</code> for living room/common spaces and <code>1</code>, <code>2</code>, ... for bedrooms</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>beds</code> <br> <i>array of objects</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>A list of beds in the room. See Room Inventory object below. The type is one of <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#bed-types">supported strings</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>room_amenities</code> <br> <i>array of objects</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>A list of room amenities in the room. See Room Inventory object below.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<p><b>Room Inventory Object</b></p>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>type</code> <br> <i>string</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The type of the inventory. </span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>quantity</code> <br> <i>integer</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The quantity of this inventory.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>

sections.name: Booking Settings API
Updating Booking Settings
sections.content:
<p>You can use call endpoint to update the listing's associated booking settings.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>PUT /v2/booking_settings/:listing_id</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-url-id-10">Request URL ID</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code><br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>the ID of the listing</span><br>
</td>
</tr></tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="request-body-parameters-8">Request Body Parameters</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>cancellation_policy_category</code> <br><i>string</i><br> <u>optional, default is <code>flexible</code></u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Cancellation policy for the listings. API only supports some of Airbnb's cancellation policies. Must be one of <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#cancellation-policies">supported values</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>check_in_time_start</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br> <u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Earliest time the guest can check in, indicated as hour <code>"8"</code>, <code>"9"</code>, <code>"10"</code>, ..., <code>"25"</code> or <code>"FLEXIBLE"</code>. </span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>check_in_time_end</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br> <u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Latest time the guest can check in, indicated as hour <code>"9"</code>, <code>"10"</code>, <code>"11"</code>, ..., <code>"26"</code> or <code>"FLEXIBLE"</code>. </span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>check_out_time</code><br> <i>integer</i> <br> <u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Latest time the guest can check out, indicated as hour between <code>0</code> and <code>23</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>instant_booking_allowed_category</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br> <u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Defines categories of guests that can make Instant Book requests. Anyone who doesn’t meet these requirements can still send a  reservation request. One of <a href="https://airbnb.com/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#instant-booking-allowed-category">supported strings</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>instant_book_welcome_message</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br> <u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>When a guest books instantly, they’ll see this greeting while they’re booking. Greet the guest and gather info about their trip.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_expectations_for_guests</code><br><i>array of objects</i><br><u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Details guests must know about the home. Set expectations that the guests must agree to before booking. See Listing Expectation parameters below.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>guest_controls</code> <br> <i>object</i> <br> <u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Rules guests must agree to before they book. See Guest Control Parameters below.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<blockquote>Enabling <code>instant_booking_allowed_category</code> (i.e. Instant Book guest requirements) means that reservation requests will be required for some bookings. You must also implement support for <a href="/partner/api-docs/reservation-management/default#accepting-or-denying-a-reservation-request">Accepting and Denying a Reservation Request</a> in your application.</blockquote>
<p><b>Listing Expectation For Guests</b></p>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>type</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br> <i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The type of the restriction the guests must agree to. Must be one of <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#listing-expectation-types">Listing Expectation Types.</a></span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>added_details</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br> <u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Provide optional details. Max 150 characters.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<p><b>Guest Controls</b></p>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>allows_children_as_host</code> <br> <i>boolean</i> <br> <i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Is listing suitable for children (2-12 years)? <a href="https://www.airbnb.com/help/article/1348/if-i-set-my-house-rules-to-allow-infants-or-children--what-should-i-know">Learn More</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>allows_infants_as_host</code> <br> <i>boolean</i> <br> <i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Is listing suitable for infants (under 2 years)? <a href="https://www.airbnb.com/help/article/1348/if-i-set-my-house-rules-to-allow-infants-or-children--what-should-i-know">Learn More</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>children_not_allowed_details</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br> <u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>If you selected false for any of the above, this field is required to provide details about why the place is not suitable for children.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>allows_smoking_as_host</code> <br> <i>boolean</i> <br> <i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Is smoking allowed?</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>allows_pets_as_host</code> <br> <i>boolean</i> <br> <i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Are pets allowed? <a href="https://www.airbnb.com/help/article/1869/what-is-an-assistance-animal">Learn More.</a></span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>allows_events_as_host</code> <br> <i>boolean</i> <br> <i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Are parties or events allowed?</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="response-18">Response</h5>
<p>A <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#booking-settings-object">Booking Settings object</a></p>
<h5 id="example-request-21">Example Request</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"PUT"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/booking_settings/24567854"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
     -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
     -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 62dyanvq40b1hn5yor1cviqoe"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
     -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: 5jah5juioe4rnbbd7xef5xqom"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
     -d <span class="s1">'{
       "cancellation_policy_category": "strict",
       "check_in_time_end": "FLEXIBLE",
       "check_in_time_start": "10",
       "check_out_time": 10,
       "guest_controls": {
         "allows_children_as_host": true,
         "allows_infants_as_host": false,
         "allows_pets_as_host": true,
         "allows_smoking_as_host": false,
         "allows_events_as_host": true,
         "children_not_allowed_details": "There are a lot of sharp objects in the house."
       },
       "instant_book_welcome_message": "Thank you for booking with us!",
       "instant_booking_allowed_category": "everyone",
       "listing_expectations_for_guests": [
         {
           "added_details": "There is construction 10AM to 5PM.",
           "type": "potential_noise"
         },
         {
           "type": "weapons"
         }
       ]
     }'</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-14">Example Response</h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"booking_setting"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"cancellation_policy_category"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"strict"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"check_in_time_end"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"FLEXIBLE"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"check_in_time_start"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"10"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"check_out_time"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"guest_controls"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"allows_children_as_host"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"allows_infants_as_host"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"allows_pets_as_host"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"allows_smoking_as_host"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"allows_events_as_host"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"children_not_allowed_details"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"There are a lot of sharp objects in the house."</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"instant_book_welcome_message"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"Thank you for booking with us!"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"instant_booking_allowed_category"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"everyone"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_expectations_for_guests"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"added_details"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"There is construction 10AM to 5PM."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"type"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"potential_noise"</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"added_details"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"type"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"weapons"</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">],</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">23549776</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"metadata"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Retrieving Booking Settings
sections.content:
<p>You can use this call to retrieve the listing's associated booking settings.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>GET /v2/booking_settings/:listing_id</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-url-id-11">Request URL ID</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code><br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>the ID of the listing</span><br>
</td>
</tr></tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="response-19">Response</h5>
<p>A <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#booking-settings-object">Booking Settings object</a></p>
<h5 id="example-request-22">Example Request</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"GET"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/booking_settings/24567854"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
     -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
     -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 62dyanvq40b1hn5yor1cviqoe"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
     -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: 5jah5juioe4rnbbd7xef5xqom"</span></code></pre>

    </span><span class="nt">"cancellation_policy_category"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"strict"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"check_in_time_end"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"FLEXIBLE"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">

    </span><span class="nt">"guest_controls"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"allows_children_as_host"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"allows_infants_as_host"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"allows_pets_as_host"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"allows_smoking_as_host"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"allows_events_as_host"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"children_not_allowed_details"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"There are a lot of sharp objects in the house."</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"instant_book_welcome_message"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"Thank you for booking with us!"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"instant_booking_allowed_category"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"everyone"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_expectations_for_guests"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"added_details"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"There is construction 10AM to 5PM."</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"type"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"potential_noise"</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">

sections.name: Booking Settings Object
sections.content:
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>cancellation_policy_category</code> <br><i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Cancellation policy for the listings. API only supports some of the policies. Must be one of the <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#cancellation-policies">supported values</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>check_in_time_start</code> <br> <i>string</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Earliest time the guest can check in, indicated as hour <code>"8"</code>, <code>"9"</code>, <code>"10"</code>, ..., <code>"25"</code> , <code>"FLEXIBLE"</code> or <code>"NOT SELECTED"</code>. </span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>check_in_time_end</code> <br> <i>string</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Latest time the guest can check in, indicated as hour <code>"9"</code>, <code>"10"</code>, <code>"11"</code>, ..., <code>"26"</code>, <code>"FLEXIBLE"</code> or or <code>"NOT SELECTED"</code>. </span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>check_out_time</code><br> <i>integer</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Latest time the guest can check out, indicated as hour between <code>0</code> and <code>23</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>instant_booking_allowed_category</code> <br> <i>string</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Defines categories of guests that can make Instant Book requests. Anyone who doesn’t meet these requirements can still send a  reservation request. One of <a href="https://airbnb.com/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#instant-booking-allowed-category">supported strings</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>instant_book_welcome_message</code> <br> <i>string</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>When a guest books instantly, they’ll see this greeting while they’re booking.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_expectations_for_guests</code><br><i>array of objects</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Details guests must know about the home. Set expectations that the guests must agree to before booking. See Listing Expectation Object below.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code> <br> <i>integer</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The id of the listing.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>guest_controls</code> <br> <i>object</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Rules guests must agree to before they book. See Guest Control Object below.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<p><b>Listing Expectation for Guests Object</b></p>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>type</code> <br> <i>string</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The type of the restriction the guests must agree to. One of <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#listing-expectation-types">Listing Expectation Types.</a></span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>added_details</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Optional details.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<p><b>Guest Controls <b> Object</b></b></p>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>allows_children_as_host</code> <br> <i>boolean</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Is listing suitable for children (2-12 years)? <a href="https://www.airbnb.com/help/article/1348/if-i-set-my-house-rules-to-allow-infants-or-children--what-should-i-know">Learn More</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>allows_infants_as_host</code> <br> <i>boolean</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Is listing suitable for infants (under 2 years)? <a href="https://www.airbnb.com/help/article/1348/if-i-set-my-house-rules-to-allow-infants-or-children--what-should-i-know">Learn More</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>children_not_allowed_details</code> <br> <i>boolean</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Details about why the place is not suitable for children.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>allows_smoking_as_host</code> <br> <i>boolean</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Is smoking allowed?</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>allows_pets_as_host</code> <br> <i>boolean</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Are pets allowed? <a href="https://www.airbnb.com/help/article/1869/what-is-an-assistance-animal">Learn More.</a></span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>allows_events_as_host</code> <br> <i>boolean</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Are parties or events allowed?</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>

sections.name: Availability Rules API
sections.content: <p>You can use the <code>/availability_rules</code> API to specify global rules when a listing is and is not available to book. To set availability rules for specific periods of time, use the <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#seasonal-rule-group-api">Seasonal Rule Group API</a> or the <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#los-records-api">LOS Records API</a>.</p>

sections.name: Rule schemas
sections.content:
<h5 id="advanced-notice-booking-lead-time">Advanced Notice (Booking Lead Time)</h5>
<p>Permits the Host to choose how much advanced notice is needed for a reservation. Instant Booking Hosts can allow guests to send reservation requests for shorter notice.</p>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>hours</code> <br> <i>integer</i> <br> <u>default is </u><u><code>48</code></u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The number of hours required for minimum notice before booking:<br>Allowed values: 0-24, 48, 72, 168</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>allow_request_to_book</code> <br> <i>integer</i> <br> <u>default is </u><u><code>0</code></u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Do you allow reservation requests for bookings with shorter notice? Use <code>0</code> to prohibit requests and <code>1</code> to allow requests.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="distant-requests-max-days-notice">Distant Requests (Max Days Notice)</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>
<span><code>days</code> <br> <i>integer</i> <br> <u>default is </u><u><code>-1</code></u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The number of days ahead of the present day that a guest can book within.<br>  -  <code>-1</code> means guest can book for any day in the future.<br>  - <code>0</code>  means guest cannot book for any day in the future<br>  - <code>90</code>, <code>180</code>,<code>365</code> means guests can only book within this many days.</span><br>
</td>
</tr></tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="min-days-notice-deprecated">Min Days Notice (Deprecated)</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>
<span><code>days</code><br><i>integer</i><br></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>DEPRECATED. Use booking_lead_time instead.</span><br>
</td>
</tr></tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="preparation-time-turnover-days">Preparation Time (Turnover Days)</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>
<span><code>days</code> <br> <i>integer</i> <br> <u>default is </u><u><code>0</code></u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The number of days of preparation time required between reservations. One of <code>0</code>, <code>1</code> or <code>2</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr></tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="seasonal-min-nights">Seasonal min nights</h5>
<p>This property is set with an array of objects, each defining the start date, end date and minimum nights for that time range.</p>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>start_date</code><br><i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Start date of date range for this rule, as <code>YYYY-MM-DD</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>end_date</code><br><i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>End date of date range for this rule, as <code>YYYY-MM-DD</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>min_nights</code><br><i>integer</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Minimum number of nights if the trip starts on a day within the range.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="day-of-the-week-check-in">Day of the Week Check In</h5>
<p>This property is set with an array of objects, each defining the day of the week the check in is allowed. Default value is array of all 7 days of the week.</p>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>
<span><code>day_of_week</code><br><i>integer</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Day of week guests are allowed to check in. Value in range 0-6, represents Sun-Sat. E.g., <code>[{"day_of_week":0}, {"day_of_week":1}]</code> means guests can only check in on Sunday and Monday.</span><br>
</td>
</tr></tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="day-of-the-week-check-out">Day of the week Check out</h5>
<p>This rule is set with an array of objects, each defining the day of the week the check in is allowed. Default value is array of all 7 days of the week.</p>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>
<span><code>day_of_week</code><br><i>integer</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Day of week guests are allowed to check out. Value in range 0-6, represents Sun-Sat. E.g., <code>[{"day_of_week":6}]</code> means guests can only check out on Saturday.</span><br>
</td>
</tr></tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="day-of-the-week-minimum-nights">Day of the week Minimum Nights</h5>
<p>This rule is set with an array of objects, each defining the day of the week and a corresponding min nights requirements for trips that start on that day. If a requirements is not passed for one of the days, it defaults to global min nights value.</p>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>day_of_week</code><br><i>integer</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Day of week that corresponds to the requirements. Value in range 0-6, representing Mon-Sun.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>min_nights</code><br><i>integer</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Min nights requirements for trips that start on that day of the week.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>

sections.name: Updating Availability Rules
sections.content:
<p>Update listing availability rules. Only the rules passed are updated, the rest remain the same. To remove a rule, include the rule's sub-object in the payload and set its field to their default value.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>PUT /v2/availability_rules/:listing_id</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-url-id-12">Request URL ID</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code><br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Listing ID</span><br>
</td>
</tr></tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="request-body-parameters-9">Request Body Parameters</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>default_min_nights</code><br><i>integer</i><br><u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The default minimum night requirement for reservations.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>default_max_nights</code><br><i>integer</i><br><u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The default maximum night requirement for reservations.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>booking_lead_time</code><br><i>object</i><br><u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>See Booking Lead Time in  <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#rule-schemas">Rule Schemas</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>min_days_notice</code><br><i>object</i><br>[DEPRECATED]</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>DEPRECATED, use <code>booking_lead_time.</code></span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>max_days_notice</code><br><i>object</i><br><u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>See Max Days Notice in  <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#rule-schemas">Rule Schemas</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>seasonal_min_nights</code><br><i>array of objects</i><br><u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>See Seasonal Min Nights in  <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#rule-schemas">Rule Schemas</a>. Do not use this rule if you are using Min Nights rules in <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#seasonal-rule-group-api">Seasonal Rule Group API</a>, as it might cause problematic conflicts.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>turnover_days</code><br><i>object</i><br><u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>See Turnover Days in  <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#rule-schemas">Rule Schemas</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>day_of_week_check_in</code><br><i>array of objects</i><br><u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>See Days of Week Check In  in  <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#rule-schemas">Rule Schemas</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>day_of_week_check_out</code><br><i>array of objects</i><br><u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>See Days of Week Check Out in  <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#rule-schemas">Rule Schemas</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>day_of_week_min_nights</code><br><i>array of objects</i><br><u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>See Days of Week Min Nights in  <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#rule-schemas">Rule Schemas</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="response-20">Response</h5>
<p>An <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#availability-rules-object">Availability Rules Object</a></p>
<h5 id="example-request-23">Example Request</h5>
<p>Example request to set distant request to 3 months, block same day and next day reservations, and restore preparation days default.</p>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -H <span class="s1">'X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 8k4rgwwudgprm758t9fkd6y24'</span> <span class="se">\</span>
     -H <span class="s1">'X-Airbnb-API-Key: gu7tsjffe4vzptgcax0ncplnq'</span> <span class="se">\</span>
     -X PUT <span class="se">\</span>
     -d <span class="s1">'{
       "default_min_nights": 3,
       "default_max_nights": 30,
       "max_days_notice" : { "days" : 90 },
       "booking_lead_time" : { "hours" : 72, "allow_request_to_book": 0 },
       "turnover_days": { "days" : 0 },
       "day_of_week_check_in": [
         { "day_of_week": 5 }
       ]
     }'</span> <span class="se">\</span>
     <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/availability_rules/4525291?"</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-16">Example Response </h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"availability_rule"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">4525291</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"default_min_nights"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"default_max_nights"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">30</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"booking_lead_time"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"hours"</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">72</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"allow_request_to_book"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"max_days_notice"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"days"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">90</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"min_days_notice"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"days"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"seasonal_min_nights"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"turnover_days"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"days"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"day_of_week_check_in"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"day_of_week"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"day_of_week"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">],</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"day_of_week_check_out"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"day_of_week"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"day_of_week"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">],</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"day_of_week_min_nights"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
      
    </span><span class="p">]</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"metadata"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    
  </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="error-handling">Error Handling</h5>
<p>If you attempt to set a calendar with conflicting availability rules, you could receive an error such as "<code>You cannot make this update with your current calendar settings</code>"</p>
<p>For example, if you require a <code>min_days_notice</code> of 1, then you cannot specify that today should be available, as these rules conflict.</p>

sections.name: Retrieving Availability Rules
sections.content:
<p>Get a listing's availability rules. </p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>GET /v2/availability_rules/:listing_id</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-url-id-13">Request URL ID</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code><br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Listing ID</span><br>
</td>
</tr></tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="response-21">Response</h5>
<p>An <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#availability-rules-object">Availability Rules Object</a></p>
<h5 id="example-request-24">Example Request</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -H <span class="s1">'X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 3k4rgwwudgprm758t9fkd6y14'</span> <span class="se">\</span>
     -H <span class="s1">'X-Airbnb-API-Key: ke1usjffe4vzptgcax0ncplnq'</span> <span class="se">\</span>
     <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/availability_rules/4525291"</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-17">Example Response</h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"availability_rule"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"default_min_nights"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"default_max_nights"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">30</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"booking_lead_time"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"hours"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">72</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"allow_request_to_book"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"day_of_week_check_in"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"day_of_week"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"day_of_week"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">],</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"day_of_week_check_out"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"day_of_week"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"day_of_week"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">],</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"day_of_week_min_nights"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
      
    </span><span class="p">],</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">4525291</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"max_days_notice"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"days"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">90</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"min_days_notice"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"days"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">-1</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"seasonal_min_nights"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"turnover_days"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"days"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"metadata"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    
  </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>
