    </span><span class="nt">"pricing_rules"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"price_change"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">120</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"price_change_type"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"ABSOLUTE"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"rule_type"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"SEASONAL_ADJUSTMENT"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"threshold_one"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"threshold_two"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"threshold_three"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"price_change"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">-20</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"price_change_type"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"PERCENT"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"rule_type"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"STAYED_AT_LEAST_X_DAYS"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"threshold_one"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"threshold_two"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"threshold_three"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"price_change"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">-120</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"price_change_type"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"ABSOLUTE"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"rule_type"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"BOOKED_WITHIN_AT_MOST_X_DAYS"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"threshold_one"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"threshold_two"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"threshold_three"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"price_change"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"price_change_type"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"PERCENT"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"rule_type"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"BOOKED_BEYOND_AT_LEAST_X_DAYS"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"threshold_one"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">30</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"threshold_two"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"threshold_three"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">],</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"availability_rules"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"closed_for_checkin"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="s2">"FRIDAY"</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">],</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"closed_for_checkout"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="s2">"SUNDAY"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="s2">"SATURDAY"</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">],</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"max_nights"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"UNSPECIFIED"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"SUNDAY"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"MONDAY"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"TUESDAY"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"WEDNESDAY"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"THURSDAY"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"FRIDAY"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"SATURDAY"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"min_nights"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"UNSPECIFIED"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"SUNDAY"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"MONDAY"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"TUESDAY"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"WEDNESDAY"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"THURSDAY"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"FRIDAY"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"SATURDAY"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"metadata"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    
  </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Retrieving Rule Groups
sections.content:
<p>This endpoint retrieves Rule Groups for a user or a specific set of groups using their IDs.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>GET /v2/seasonal_rule_sets</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-url-parameters-6">Request URL Parameters</h5>
<p>Exactly one of <code>user_id</code> , <code>rule_group_ids</code>  is required.</p>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>user_id</code><br><i>integer</i><br><u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The ID of the user to retrieve the rules for. </span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>rule_group_ids</code><br><i>array of integers</i><br><u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>An array of Rule Group IDs to retrieve.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="response-30">Response</h5>
<p>Array of <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#rule-group-object"> Rule Group</a> objects</p>
<h5 id="example-request-1">Example Request 1</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"GET"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/seasonal_rule_sets?rule_group_ids[]=1440227&amp;rule_group_ids[]=1440248"</span>  <span class="se">\</span>
-H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
-H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: bop89ve6mt5ucs8db2lti93b3"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
-H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: 5jah5juioe4rnbbd7xef5xqom"</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="example-request-2">Example Request 2</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"GET"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/seasonal_rule_sets?user_id=151542124"</span>  <span class="se">\ </span>
-H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span>  <span class="se">\</span>
-H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: a880nfkw12clzxzkd0au0nb70"</span>  <span class="se">\</span>
-H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: 5jah5juioe4rnbbd7xef5xqom"</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Deleting a Rule Group
sections.content:
<p>This endpoint takes a Rule Group ID as a URL ID parameter</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>DELETE /v2/seasonal_rule_sets/:rule_group_id</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-url-id-20">Request URL ID</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>
<span><code>rule_group_id</code><br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The id of the Rule Group</span><br>
</td>
</tr></tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="response-31">Response</h5>
<p>Empty<a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#rule-group-object"> Rule Group</a> object</p>
<h5 id="example-request-32">Example Request</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"DELETE"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/seasonal_rule_sets/1439311?"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
-H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
-H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: a880nfkw12clzxzkd0au0nb70"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
-H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: 5jah5juioe4rnbbd7xef5xqom"</span> </code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-25">Example Response</h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"seasonal_rule_set"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1439311</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"created_by_user_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">151542124</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"color"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"title"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"Winter"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"pricing_rules"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
      
    </span><span class="p">],</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"availability_rules"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"metadata"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    
  </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Rule Group Object
sections.content:
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>id</code><br><i>integer</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Rule Group ID</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>color</code><br><i>integer</i><br></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Color to show on calendars for the rule group. Value = 0-8.<br><br><br></span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>created_by_user_id</code><br><i>integer</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>ID of user who created rule group</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>pricing_rules</code><br><i>array of objects</i><br></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Array of <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#pricing-rule-object">Pricing Rule </a>objects</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>availability_rules</code><br><i>object</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span><a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#availability-rule-object">Availability Rule</a> object.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>

sections.name: Pricing Rule Object
sections.content:
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>rule_type</code><br><i>string</i><br></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>One of:<br><code>SEASONAL_ADJUSTMENT</code> - Season adjustment<br><code>STAYED_AT_LEAST_X_DAYS</code> - Long-term stay adjustment<br><code>BOOKED_WITHIN_AT_MOST_X_DAYS</code> - Last-minute discount<br><code>BOOKED_BEYOND_AT_LEAST_X_DAYS</code> - Booking ahead discount<br></span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>price_change<br></code><i>integer</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>If <code>rule_type</code> is  <code>SEASONAL_ADJUSTMENT,</code>  this field can be either positive or negative.<br>Otherwise, <code>price_change</code> must be a negative value, meaning price decrease.<br><br><br></span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>price_change_type</code><br><i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Either <code>PERCENT</code> or <code>ABSOLUTE</code> (fixed dollar amount).</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>threshold_one</code><br><i>non-negative integer</i><br></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Specifies the X value in the <code>X_DAYS</code> rules.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>threshold_two</code><br><i>non-negative integer</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Reserved for future use.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>threshold_three</code><br><i>non-negative integer</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Reserved for future use.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>

sections.name: Availability Rule Object
sections.content:
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>closed_for_checkout</code><br><i>array of strings</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Days in week that guest cannot check out. Comma-separated array of enum strings. One of <code>"MONDAY"</code>, <code>"TUESDAY"</code>, <code>"WEDNESDAY"</code>, <code>"THURSDAY"</code>, <code>"FRIDAY"</code>, <code>"SATURDAY"</code> or "<code>SUNDAY"</code>. </span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>closed_for_checkin</code><br><i>array of strings</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Days in week that guest cannot check in. Comma-separated array of enum strings. One of <code>"MONDAY"</code>, <code>"TUESDAY"</code>, <code>"WEDNESDAY"</code>, <code>"THURSDAY"</code>, <code>"FRIDAY"</code>, <code>"SATURDAY"</code> or "<code>SUNDAY"</code>. </span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>max_nights</code><br><i>map of string to integer</i><br></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Map from day of week to corresponding max nights value, which is the maximum length of stay if the trip starts on this day. Day is one of <code>"MONDAY"</code>, <code>"TUESDAY"</code>, <code>"WEDNESDAY"</code>, <code>"THURSDAY"</code>, <code>"FRIDAY"</code>, <code>"SATURDAY"</code>, <code>"SUNDAY"</code> or <code>"UNSPECIFIED"</code>. If any days are missing, the <code>"UNSPECIFIED"</code> value is used. If there is no <code>"UNSPECIFIED"</code> value,  then 1095 days is used. E.g., <code>"max_nights": { "UNSPECIFIED": 14, "TUESDAY" : 21, "SATURDAY" : "7" }.</code></span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>min_nights</code><br><i>map of string to integer</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Map from day of week to corresponding min nights value, which is the minimum length of stay if the trip starts on this day. Day is one of <code>"MONDAY"</code>, <code>"TUESDAY"</code>, <code>"WEDNESDAY"</code>, <code>"THURSDAY"</code>, <code>"FRIDAY"</code>, <code>"SATURDAY"</code>, <code>"SUNDAY"</code> or <code>"UNSPECIFIED"</code>. If any days are missing, the <code>"UNSPECIFIED"</code> value is used. If there is no <code>"UNSPECIFIED"</code> value,  then 1 is used.  E.g., <code>"min_nights": { "UNSPECIFIED": 2, "TUESDAY" : 4, "SATURDAY" : "3" }</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>

sections.name: Listing Rule Group Timeline API
Applying or Removing a Rule Group
sections.content:
<p>This action lets you apply or remove a Rule Group to/from a listing for a given set of dates. If multiple rule groups are applied to the same listing for the same date range, the latest one overrides the previous one - only one rule group is applied to a listing on a specific date range.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>PUT /v2/listing_seasonal_rule_set_timelines/:listing_id</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-url-id-21">Request URL ID</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>ID</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code><br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The ID of the listing.</span><br>
</td>
</tr></tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="request-body-parameters-15">Request Body Parameters</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>since_date</code><br><i>string</i><br><b><i>required</i></b></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Start date in ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD format.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>end_date</code><br><i>string</i><br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>End date in ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD format.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>seasonal_rule_group_id</code><br><i>integer</i><br><u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Rule Group ID to apply. If null or ommited, any existing rule groups will be removed for the given dates.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="response-32">Response</h5>
<p>A <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#listing-rule-groups-timeline-object">Listing Rule Groups Timeline Object</a></p>
<h5 id="example-request-33">Example Request</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"PUT"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_seasonal_rule_set_timelines/21562250"</span>  <span class="se">\</span>
 -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span>  <span class="se">\</span>
 -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: bop89ve6mt5ucs8db2lti93b3"</span> <span class="se">\ </span>
 -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: 5jah5juioe4rnbbd7xef5xqom"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
 -d <span class="s1">'{ "since_date": "2018-03-10", "end_date": "2018-03-20", "seasonal_rule_group_id": 1440227 }'</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-26">Example Response</h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"listing_seasonal_rule_set_timeline"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">21562250</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"rule_group_timeline"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"end_date"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"2018-03-20"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"seasonal_rule_group_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1440227</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"since_date"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"2018-03-10"</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">]</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Retrieving Listing Rule Groups
sections.content:
<p>This endpoint gets all Rule Groups for a listing. You need to pass the Listing ID as a URL ID parameter.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>GET /v2/listing_seasonal_rule_set_timelines/:listing_id</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-url-id-22">Request URL ID</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>ID</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code><br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The ID of the listing.</span><br>
</td>
</tr></tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="response-33">Response</h5>
<p>A<a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#listing-rule-groups-timeline-object"> Listing Rule Groups Timeline Object</a></p>
<h5 id="example-request-34">Example Request</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"GET"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_seasonal_rule_set_timelines/21562250"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
 -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span>  <span class="se">\</span>
 -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: bop89ve6mt5ucs8db2lti93b3"</span>  <span class="se">\</span>
 -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: 5jah5juioe4rnbbd7xef5xqom"</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-27">Example Response</h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"listing_seasonal_rule_set_timeline"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">21562250</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"rule_group_timeline"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"end_date"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"2018-03-20"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"since_date"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"2018-03-10"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"seasonal_rule_group_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1440227</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">]</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Retrieving Listings Rule Groups for Date Range
sections.content:
<p>These endpoint clears the Rule Group for all listings on the dates specified.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>GET /v2/listing_seasonal_rule_set_timelines</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-url-parameters-7">Request URL Parameters</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_ids</code><br><i>array of integers</i><br><b><i>required</i></b></span><br>

<td>
<span>Comma-separated listing ID array.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>since_date</code><br><i>string</i><br><u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Start date in ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD format. If passed, <code>end_date</code> must also be passed.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>end_date</code><br><i>string</i><br><u>optional</u></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>End date in ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD format.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>

<h5 id="example-request-35">Example Request</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"GET"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_seasonal_rule_set_timelines?listing_ids[]=20746517&amp;listing_ids[]=20725794&amp;since_date=2018-01-01&amp;end_date=2019-01-01"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
-H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span>  <span class="se">\</span>
-H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: bop89ve6mt5ucs8db2lti93b3"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
-H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: 5jah5juioe4rnbbd7xef5xqom"</span>  <span class="se">\</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-28">Example Response</h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"listing_seasonal_rule_set_timelines"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">20746517</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"rule_group_timeline"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
          </span><span class="nt">"end_date"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"2019-10-01"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
          </span><span class="nt">"since_date"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"2018-01-01"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
          </span><span class="nt">"seasonal_rule_group_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">]</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">20725794</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"rule_group_timeline"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[]</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">

sections.name: LOS Records API
sections.content: <p>This API allows you to set a listing's pricing and availability for specified date/time periods by using a list of length-of-stay records (LOS records). It is an alternative to the Seasonal Rule Group API that allows for more flexibility in setting pricing and availability for specific dates and stays.</p>

sections.name: Applying or Removing LOS Records
sections.content:
<p>This action lets you apply or remove LOS records to/from a listing for a given set of dates.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>PUT /v2/los_records/:listing_id?_full_update=</code></pre>
<p>To apply LOS records:</p>
<div><ul><li>
<span>Call <code>/v2/los_records</code> with a non-empty <code>los_records</code> array in the payload.</span><br>
</li></ul></div>
<p>To remove LOS records:</p>
<div><ul><li>
<span>Call <code>/v2/los_records</code> with an empty <code>los_records</code> array <b>AND</b> do a full update.</span><br>
</li></ul></div>
<blockquote>When applying LOS records, you must also provide a base nightly rate for the listing using the Pricing API. This value will only be used to display the price when guests search without dates and does not impact availability.</blockquote>
<blockquote>For more details on how applying LOS records interacts with other pricing and availability rules, see the appendix section about <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#applying-los-records">Applying LOS Records</a>.</blockquote>
<h5 id="request-url-parameters-8">Request URL Parameters</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code><br><i>integer</i><br>required</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Listing ID</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>full_update</code><br><i>boolean</i><br>optional, default is false</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>If true, the passed in records will fully replace the existing DB table<br>If false, the passed in records will be inserted into existing DB table</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="request-body-parameters-16">Request Body Parameters</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>
<span><code>los_records</code><br><i>array of strings</i><br>optional</span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>An array of strings; each string represents one record in LOS records.<br>The string should be separated by commas in the following way:<br>check_in_date, guest_number_range, price_for_1_night, price_for_2_nights,...</span><br>
</td>
</tr></tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="response-35">Response</h5>
<p>A <a href="/partner/api-docs/listing-management/rest#los-record-response-object">LOS Record Response Object</a></p>
<h5 id="example-request-36"><b>Example Request</b></h5>
<p>Applying LOS records:</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>PUT /v2/los_records/:listing_id?_full_update=true</code></pre>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"los_records"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="s2">"2019-01-01,1,100,210,0,390,550,580,0,820"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="s2">"2019-01-01,2,200,410,0,690,1050,1080,0,1620"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="s2">"2019-01-01,4,400,810,0,1290,1550,1580,0,1820"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="s2">"2019-01-01,5,0"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="s2">"2019-01-01,6,600,1620,2350,3500,0,4230,4750,5240"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="s2">"2019-01-02,1,100,210,0,390,550,580,0,820"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="s2">"2019-01-02,4,300,610,0,990,1550,1580,0,2020"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">]</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>
<p>Removing LOS records:</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>PUT /v2/los_records/:listing_id?_full_update=true</code></pre>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"los_records"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[]</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-29">Example Response</h5>
<p>Applying LOS records:</p>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"los_record"</span><span class="p">:{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"los_enabled"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>
<p>Removing LOS records:</p>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"los_record"</span><span class="p">:{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"los_enabled"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">false</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: LOS Record Data Format
sections.content:
<p>The general format for each string in the <code>los_records</code> array is:</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>&lt;checkin date&gt;,&lt;max guest number&gt;,&lt;1 night price&gt;,&lt;2 nights price&gt;,&lt;3 nights price&gt;,...</code></pre>
<h5 id="example">Example</h5>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>2019-01-01,1,100,210,0,390,550,580,0,820
</code></pre>
<p>If 1 guest checks in on 2019-01-01, the price for staying 1 night would be 100, the price for 2 nights would be 210, and staying 3 nights is not available.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>2019-01-01,2,200,410,0,690,1050,1080,0,1620</code></pre>
<p>Same as above, but this record indicates the prices for 2 guests checking in on 2019-01-01.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>2019-01-01,4,400,810,0,1290,1550,1580,0,1820</code></pre>
<p>Same as above, but this record indicates the prices for &gt;2 and &lt;=4 guests.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>2019-01-01,5,0
</code></pre>
<p>The listing is not available for 5 guests if check-in date is 2019-01-01.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>2019-01-01,6,600,1620,2350,3500,0,4230,4750,5240
</code></pre>
<p>Prices for 6 guests if check-in date is 2019-01-01.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>2019-01-02,1,100,210,0,390,550,580,0,820
</code></pre>
<p>Prices for 1 guest if check-in date is 2019-01-02.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>2019-01-02,4,300,610,0,990,1550,1580,0,2020</code></pre>
<p>Prices for &gt;1 and &lt;=4 guests if check-in date is 2019-01-02.</p>
<p>Note that:</p>
<div><ul>
<li>
<span>The check-in date should be within the next 18 months (550 days). If the LOS records do not contain prices for certain check-in dates, we will mark these dates as not available for check-in.</span><br>
</li>
<li>
<span>For any combination of check-in date and max guest number, we support up to 28 days' length-of-stay prices. This is a maximum cap; you can send prices for &gt;=1 and &lt;=28 nights. If the LOS records do not contain prices for certain length-of-stays, we will mark these dates as not available for check-in. For stays longer than 28 days, we will mark days as unavailable.</span><br>
</li>
<li>
<span>If the LOS records do not contain data for certain dates, either as check-in dates or as part of a stay, we will mark these dates as unavailable.</span><br>
</li>
<li>
<span>Each price should be an integer. If the listing is not available for a particular length-of-stay, the price should be set to 0.</span><br>
</li>
<li>
<span>The guest number is the <b>max</b> guest number (please see the example on third row). This number should be an integer &gt;=1 and &lt;=16, as bookings on Airbnb usually do not differentiate the prices beyond 16 guests.</span><br>
</li>
</ul></div>

sections.name: LOS Record Response Object
sections.content:
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>
<span><code>los_enabled</code><br><i>boolean</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span><code>true</code> if LOS records were applied, <code>false</code> if LOS records were removed.<br><br><br></span><br>
</td>
</tr></tbody>
</table></div>

sections.name: Listing Regulations API
sections.content: <p>This API lets you submit required listing regulation information for an Airbnb listing in markets where such information is required by local regulations. To submit listing regulation information, you must provide one or more of a listing's existing registration with <annotation>the market's regulatory body, a valid exemption from listing registration, or a listing residency category. Supported markets are listed in the sections below.</annotation></p>

sections.name: Creating or Updating Regulation Information
sections.content:
<p>You can use this endpoint to submit new regulation information or update existing regulation information.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>POST /v2/listing_permits</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-body-parameters-17">Request Body Parameters</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code> <br> <i>integer</i> <br> <i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Associated listing ID.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>regulatory_body</code> <br> <i>string</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The regulatory body that requires the permit. All in lowercase. One of: <code>"japan"</code>, <code>"catalonia"</code>, <code>"andalucia"</code>, <code>"portugal"</code>, <code>"vancouver"</code>, <code>"santa_monica"</code>, <code>"chicago"</code>, <code>"san_francisco"</code>, <code>"france"</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>registration</code> <br> <i>object</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The listing's Registration object. This is required if submitting a listing registration.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>exemption</code> <br> <i>object</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The listing's Exemption object. This is required if submitting an exemption from listing registration.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>categorization</code> <br> <i>object</i> </span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The listing's Categorization object. This is required if sumbitting a residency category for the listing.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<p>Either a <code>registration</code>,  <code>exemption</code> or <code>categorization</code> object must be provided. The required fields for the <code>registration</code>,  <code>exemption</code> or <code>categorization</code> vary by market. Sections below describe the required formats for supported markets.</p>

sections.name: Retrieving a Regulation Requirement Status
sections.content:
<p>You can use this endpoint to retrieve the status of a specific regulation requirement. It applies to all regulatory bodies.</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>GET /v2/listing_permits/:listing_id/:regulatory_body</code></pre>
<h5 id="request-url-id-23">Request URL ID</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code> <br> <b><i>required</i></b></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The id of the listing.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>regulatory_body</code> <br> <b><i>required</i></b></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The regulatory body with which the listing is registered.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="response-36">Response</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>
<span><code>status</code> <br></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>One of:<br><code>null</code> - The listing is not in a restricted market of this regulatory body.<br><code>"exempt"</code> - Regulation information is not needed for this listing.<br><code>"initial"</code> - No regulation information has been submitted yet.<br><code>"pending"</code> - Regulation information has been submitted and is currently under review.<br><code>"success"</code> - The regulation requirement has been met successfully.<br><code>"failed_recoverable"</code> - The regulation information submission failed, but can be resubmitted.<br><code>"failed"</code> - The regulation information submission failed and cannot be resubmitted. </span><br>
</td>
</tr></tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="example-request-37">Example Request</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"GET"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_permits/1955643/japan"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 8uaxi4r1busbeg21fuacga40c"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: av8mf8kd4k40fq26xxd9w4p44"</span> <span class="se">\</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-30">Example Response </h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"listing_permit"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1955643</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"regulatory_body"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"japan"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"status"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"pending"</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"metadata"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Japan Required Fields
sections.content:
<p>Either a Registration or Exemption object is required in Japan.</p>
<h5 id="prerequisite">Prerequisite</h5>
<p>Only listings whose Host's country of residence is Japan can be listed in Japan. Please make sure that the Host's country of residence matches the listing. Otherwise the registration status will always be <code>"failed"</code>.</p>
<h5 id="registration-object">Registration Object</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>permit_number</code><br><i>string<br><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The notification number received from the authority. This number will be displayed on the listing's page. Example: <code>"M123456789"</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>email</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The Host's email address.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>full_name</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The Host's full legal name. This should match the name that was used on the notification application.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="exemption-object">Exemption Object</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>issuing_authority</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>This can be found on the Host's license certificate. Example: <code>"XX県 XX保健所"</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>reason</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>One of the following:<br><code>"HOTELS_AND_INNS_ACT"</code>,<br><code>"ECONOMIC_ZONING_ACT"</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>license_number</code><br><i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>This is used for <code>"HOTELS_AND_INNS_ACT"</code>. It can be found on the Host's license certificate. Example: <code>"第H30-123号"</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>permission_number</code><br><i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>This is used for <code>"ECONOMIC_ZONING_ACT"</code>. It can be found on the Host's permission certificate. Example: <code>"30健生発第123号（大田区)"</code> or <code>"大阪市指令大保環第123号（大阪市)"</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>email</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The Host's email address.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>full_name</code> <br> <i>string</i> <br><i><b>required</b></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The Host's full legal name. This should match the name that is used on their certificate.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="example-request-38"><annotation>Example Request</annotation></h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"POST"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_permits"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 8uaxi4r1busbeg21fuacga40c"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: av8mf8kd4k40fq26xxd9w4p44"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -d <span class="s1">'{
    "regulatory_body": "japan",
    "listing_id": 1234567,
    "registration": {
      "email": "nino@example.com",
      "full_name": "Takeshi Nino",
      "permit_number": "M123456789"
    }
  }'</span>
  
curl -X <span class="s2">"POST"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_permits"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 8uaxi4r1busbeg21fuacga40c"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: av8mf8kd4k40fq26xxd9w4p44"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -d <span class="s1">'{
    "regulatory_body": "japan",
    "listing_id": 1234567,
    "exemption": {
      "email": "nino@example.com",
      "full_name": "Takeshi Nino",
      "reason": "HOTELS_AND_INNS_ACT",
      "license_number": "第H30-123号",
      "issuing_authority": "東京都島しょ保健所"
    }
  }'</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-31">Example Response</h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"listing_permit"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1234567</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"regulatory_body"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"japan"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"status"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"pending"</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"metadata"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Catalonia Required Fields
sections.content:
<p>Either a Registration or Exemption object is required in Catalonia.</p>
<h5 id="registration-object-2">Registration Object</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>permit_number</code><br><i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The permit number registered with the Tourism Register of Catalonia. This number will be displayed on the listing's page. Example: <code>"HUTB-123456"</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>registration_ownership</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The person whose <code>email</code>, <code>full_name</code>, and <code>identification_number</code> are provided in the <code>registration</code> object. One of the following: <code>"OWNER"</code> or <code>"PROPERTY_MANAGER"</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>email</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The email address of either the owner of the listing or the property manager.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>full_name</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The full legal name of either the owner of the listing or the property manager. This should match the name that was used on the notification application.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>identification_number</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The Spanish national identity number, employer identification number, or taxpayer identification number of either the owner of the listing or the property manager.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="exemption-object-2">Exemption Object</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>reason</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>One of the following:<br><code>"listing_not_full_building"</code>,<br><code>"listing_is_shared_room"</code>,<br><code>"other_exemption_reason"</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>registration_ownership</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The person whose <code>email</code>, <code>full_name</code>, and <code>identification_number</code> are provided in the <code>exemption</code> object. One of the following: <code>"OWNER"</code> or <code>"PROPERTY_MANAGER"</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>email</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The email address of either the owner of the listing or the property manager.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>full_name</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The full legal name of either the owner of the listing or the property manager. This should match the name that is used on their certificate.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>identification_number</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The Spanish national identity number, employer identification number, or taxpayer identification number of either the owner of the listing or the property manager.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="example-request-39">Example Request</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"POST"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_permits"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 8uaxi4r1busbeg21fuacga40c"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: av8mf8kd4k40fq26xxd9w4p44"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -d <span class="s1">'{
    "regulatory_body": "catalonia",
    "listing_id": 1234567,
    "registration": {
      "registration_ownership": "OWNER",
      "email": "mariocruz@example.com",
      "full_name": "Mario Cruz",
      "permit_number": "HUTB-123456"，
      "identification_number": "12345678A"
    }
  }'</span>
  
curl -X <span class="s2">"POST"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_permits"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 8uaxi4r1busbeg21fuacga40c"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: av8mf8kd4k40fq26xxd9w4p44"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -d <span class="s1">'{
    "regulatory_body": "catalonia",
    "listing_id": 1234567,
    "exemption": {
      "registration_ownership": "OWNER",
      "email": "mariocruz@example.com",
      "full_name": "Mario Cruz",
      "reason": "listing_not_full_building",
      "identification_number": "12345678A"
    }
  }'</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-32">Example Response</h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"listing_permit"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1234567</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"regulatory_body"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"catalonia"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"status"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"pending"</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"metadata"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Andalusia Required Fields
sections.content:
<p>Either a Registration or Exemption object is required in Andalusia.</p>
<h5 id="registration-object-3">Registration Object</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>permit_number</code><br><i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The permit number with the registration authority. This number will be displayed on the listing's page. Example: <code>"VFT/HU/00000"</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>registration_ownership</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The person whose <code>email</code>, <code>full_name</code>, and <code>identification_number</code> are provided in the <code>registration</code> object. One of the following: <code>"OWNER"</code> or <code>"PROPERTY_MANAGER"</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>email</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The email address of either the owner of the listing or the property manager.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>full_name</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The full legal name of either the owner of the listing or the property manager. This should match the name that was used on the notification application.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>identification_number</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The Spanish national identity number, employer identification number, or taxpayer identification number of either the owner of the listing or the property manager.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="exemption-object-3">Exemption Object</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>reason</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>One of the following:<br><code>"LISTING_TYPE_NOT_INCLUDED"</code>,<br><code>"LISTING_NOT_TOURIST_ACCOMMODATION"</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>registration_ownership</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The person whose <code>email</code>, <code>full_name</code>, and <code>identification_number</code> are provided in the <code>exemption</code> object. One of the following: <code>"OWNER"</code> or <code>"PROPERTY_MANAGER"</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>email</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The email address of either the owner of the listing or the property manager.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>full_name</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The full legal name of either the owner of the listing or the property manager. This should match the name that is used on their certificate.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>identification_number</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The Spanish national identity number, employer identification number, or taxpayer identification number of either the owner of the listing or the property manager.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<blockquote>For Andalusia, the <code>regulatory_body</code> is spelled <code>"andalucia"</code>.</blockquote>
<h5 id="example-request-40">Example Request</h5>
<pre class="highlight bash"><code>curl -X <span class="s2">"POST"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_permits"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 8uaxi4r1busbeg21fuacga40c"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: av8mf8kd4k40fq26xxd9w4p44"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -d <span class="s1">'{
    "regulatory_body": "andalucia",
    "listing_id": 1234567,
    "registration": {
      "registration_ownership": "OWNER",
      "email": "mariocruz@example.com",
      "full_name": "Mario Cruz",
      "permit_number": "VFT/HU/00000"，
      "identification_number": "12345678A"
    }
  }'</span>
  
curl -X <span class="s2">"POST"</span> <span class="s2">"https://api.airbnb.com/v2/listing_permits"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"Content-Type: application/json"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-Oauth-Token: 8uaxi4r1busbeg21fuacga40c"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -H <span class="s2">"X-Airbnb-API-Key: av8mf8kd4k40fq26xxd9w4p44"</span> <span class="se">\</span>
  -d <span class="s1">'{
    "regulatory_body": "andalucia",
    "listing_id": 1234567,
    "exemption": {
      "registration_ownership": "OWNER",
      "email": "mariocruz@example.com",
      "full_name": "Mario Cruz",
      "reason": "LISTING_NOT_TOURIST_ACCOMMODATION",
      "identification_number": "12345678A"
    }
  }'</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="example-response-33">Example Response</h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"listing_permit"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1234567</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"regulatory_body"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"andalucia"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"status"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"pending"</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"metadata"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Portugal Required Fields
sections.content:
<p>Either a Registration or Exemption object is required in Portugal.</p>
<h5 id="registration-object-4">Registration Object</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>permit_number</code><br><i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The permit number with the registration authority. Example: <code>"12345/AL"</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>registration_ownership</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The person whose <code>email</code>, <code>full_name</code>, and <code>tax_id</code> are provided in the <code>registration</code> object. One of the following: <code>"OWNER"</code> or <code>"PROPERTY_MANAGER"</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>email</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The email address of either the owner of the listing or the property manager.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>full_name</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The full legal name of either the owner of the listing or the property manager. This should match the name that was used on the notification application.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>tax_id</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The tax id number of either the owner of the listing or the property manager. Example: <code>"123 456 789"</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="exemption-object-4">Exemption Object</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Parameter</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>reason</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>One of the following:<br><code>"listing is not a full building"</code>,<br><code>"listing has a registered urban lease contract"</code>,</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>registration_ownership</code> <br> <i>string<br><i><b>required</b></i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The person whose <code>email</code>  and <code>full_name </code>are provided in the <code>exemption</code> object. One of the following: <code>"OWNER"</code> or <code>"PROPERTY_MANAGER"</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
