sections.name: Reservation Object
sections.content:
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>cancellation_policy_category</code><br><i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The <a href="https://www.airbnb.com/home/cancellation_policies">cancellation policy category</a>: one of <a href="/partner/api-docs/reservation-management/default#cancellation-policies">supported strings</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>confirmation_code</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Confirmation code (10 chars)</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>created_at</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span><a href="https://www.iso.org/iso-8601-date-and-time-format.html">ISO-8601 </a>formatted string representing the time the guest initiated the reservation, i.e. entered the checkout page.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>updated_at</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span><a href="https://www.iso.org/iso-8601-date-and-time-format.html">ISO-8601 </a>formatted string representing the time the reservation was last updated.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>booked_at</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span><a href="https://www.iso.org/iso-8601-date-and-time-format.html">ISO-8601 </a>formatted string representing the time the reservation was confirmed, i.e. when it entered the accepted state.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>start_date</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The beginning of the reservation, in ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD format.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>end_date</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Reservation end date in ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD format.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>guest_details</code> <br><i>object</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The breakdown of the number of guests. A hash including <code>number_of_adults</code>, <code>number_of_children</code>, <code>number_of_infants</code>.  (Note: infants do not count towards the guest count on Airbnb).</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>guest_email</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Guest email via Airbnb email proxy, e.g. <a href="mailto:hm8tpk@guest.airbnb.com">hm8tpk@guest.airbnb.com</a></span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>guest_first_name</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Guest's first name </span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>guest_id</code> <br> <i>integer</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Guest's Airbnb ID</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>guest_last_name</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Guest's last name</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>guest_phone_numbers</code> <br> <i>array of strings</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Array of Guest's phone numbers</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>guest_preferred_locale</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Guest's native locale</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>host_currency</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The currency of the amount this in which reservation is quoted</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>host_id</code> <br> <i>integer</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Host's Airbnb ID</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>expected_payout_amount_accurate</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Amount paid to Host for reservation, in Host's currency. Formatted with the recommended <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217">ISO-4217 exponent</a> corresponding to the currency. See <a href="/partner/api-docs/reservation-management/default#decimal-formatting-for-accurate-fields">decimal formatting</a>. To lean more about how payout is calculated see <a href="/partner/api-docs/reservation-management/default#payout-details">Payout Details</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_base_price_accurate</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Reservation price without fees. Formatted with the recommended <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217">ISO-4217 exponent</a> corresponding to the currency.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_host_fee_accurate</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Airbnb service fee charged to host. Formatted with the recommended <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217">ISO-4217 exponent</a> corresponding to the currency.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_security_price_accurate</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Amount of security deposit. Formatted with the recommended <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217">ISO-4217 exponent</a> corresponding to the currency. This deposit is held by Airbnb and refunded to the guest unless a claim is made within 48hrs of guest checkout.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_cleaning_fee_accurate</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Amount of cleaning fee. Formatted with the recommended <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217">ISO-4217 exponent</a> corresponding to the currency.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_cancellation_payout_accurate</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Amount paid to the Host in case of cancellation. Defaults to 0 unless the reservation was cancelled. If cancelled by Host, this is 0. Formatted with the recommended <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217">ISO-4217 exponent</a> corresponding to the currency. See <a href="/partner/api-docs/reservation-management/default#payout-details">payout details</a> for examples.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_cancellation_host_fee_accurate</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The Host fee taken by Airbnb in case of cancellation. Defaults to 0 unless the reservation was cancelled. If cancelled by host, this is 0. See <a href="/partner/api-docs/reservation-management/default#payout-details">payout details</a> for examples.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_id</code> <br> <i>integer</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Listing's Airbnb ID</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>special_offer_id</code> <br> <i>integer</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The id of the offer if the reservation was created through an accepted Special Offer or pre-approval. Otherwise <code>null</code>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>nights</code> <br> <i>integer</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Number of nights</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>number_of_guests</code> <br> <i>integer<br><i>[DEPRECATED]</i><br></i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The number of guests. Deprecated: use <code>guest_details</code> intead.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>occupancy_tax_amount_paid_to_host_accurate</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The tax amount for hosts who opt-in to Occupancy Tax Remittance</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>status_type</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>See <a href="/partner/api-docs/reservation-management/default#reservation-status">possible values</a></span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>standard_fees_details</code><br><i>array of objects</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Array of standard fees applied to the reservation. See Standard Fee Object below</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>thread_id</code> <br> <i>integer</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>ID of the message thread asscoicated with reservation to use for <a href="/partner/api-docs/messaging">Messaging API</a>.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>total_paid_amount_accurate</code> <br> <i>string </i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The cumulative sum of all payouts (consolidated of past and current) that have been released to the Host.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>transient_occupancy_tax_paid_amount_accurate</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The transient occupancy tax amount Airbnb paid on behalf of the host. Formatted with the recommended <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217">ISO-4217 exponent</a> corresponding to the currency.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>transient_occupancy_tax_details</code> <br> <i>object</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The breakdown and descriptions of the transient occupancy tax amount paid. Values are in USD and conversions are calculated at market rates.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="standard-fee-object">Standard Fee Object</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>fee_type</code><br><i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>One of: <code>PASS_THROUGH_RESORT_FEE</code>, <code>PASS_THROUGH_MANAGEMENT_FEE</code>, <code>PASS_THROUGH_COMMUNITY_FEE</code>, <code>PASS_THROUGH_LINEN_FEE.</code></span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>amount_native</code><br><i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The amount charged in listing's currency.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="deprecated-fields">Deprecated Fields</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>expected_payout_amount</code> <br> <i>[DEPRECATED]</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>This field is deprecated. Use <code>expected_payout_amount_accurate</code> instead.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_base_price</code> <br> <i>[DEPRECATED]</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>This field is deprecated. Use <code>listing_base_price_accurate</code> instead.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_host_fee</code> <br> <i>[DEPRECATED]</i><br></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>This field is deprecated. Use <code>expected_payout_amount_accurate</code> instead.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_security_price</code> <br> <i>[DEPRECATED]</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>This field is deprecated. Use <code>listing_security_price_accurate</code> instead.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_cleaning_fee</code> <br> <i>[DEPRECATED]</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>This field is deprecated. Use <code>listing_cleaning_fee_accurate</code> instead.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_cancellation_payout</code> <br> <i>[DEPRECATED]</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>This field is deprecated. Use <code>listing_cancellation_payout_accurate</code> instead.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>listing_cancellation_host_fee</code> <br> <i>[DEPRECATED]</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>This field is deprecated. Use <code>listing_cancellation_host_fee_accurate</code> instead.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>occupancy_tax_amount_paid_to_host</code> <br> <i>[DEPRECATED]</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>This field is deprecated. Use <code>occupancy_tax_amount_paid_to_host_accurate</code> instead.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>total_paid_amount</code> <br> <i>[DEPRECATED]</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>This field is deprecated. Use <code>total_paid_amount_accurate</code> instead.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>transient_occupancy_tax_paid_amount</code><br><i>[DEPRECATED]</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span></span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>cancellation_policy</code> <br><i>[DEPRECATED]</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>This field is deprecated. Use <code>cancellation_policy_category</code> instead.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>

sections.name: Webhook Notifications
sections.content: <p>This section describes the reservation management Webhook notifications your application could receive. Please refer to the <a href="/partner/api-docs/get-started/default">Getting Started </a>guide for information on setting up Webhook notifications.</p>

sections.name: Special Offer Updates Notifications
sections.content:
<pre class="highlight text"><code>special_offer_created
special_offer_voided</code></pre>
<p>This notification is sent when Special Offers and pre-approvals are created, withdrawn or  expired. We send notifications for special offer updates performed both via API and by the host manually on Airbnb.</p>
<h5 id="notification-payload">Notification Payload</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>action</code><br><i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>One of <code>"special_offer_created"</code>, <code>"special_offer_voided"</code> (when special offer is withdrawn or expires)</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>special_offer</code><br><i>object</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Special Offer object</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="example-notification">Example Notification</h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"action"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"special_offer_created"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"special_offer"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"block_instant_booking"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"created_at"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"2018-10-11T11:57:24Z"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expires_at"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"2018-10-12T11:57:24Z"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"guest_details"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"number_of_adults"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"number_of_children"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"number_of_infants"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">134672417</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"is_active"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">27110350</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"nights"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"number_of_guests"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"offer_type"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"special_offer"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"rescinded_at"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"start_date"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"2018-10-25"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"thread_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">476749234</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_price"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">300</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Pending Reservation Notifications
sections.content:
<pre class="highlight text"><code>reservation_requested
reservation_request_voided</code></pre>
<p>This notification is sent when a new reservation is requested or the reservation request is voided. See <a href="/partner/api-docs/reservation-management#request-to-book-flow">Request to Book Flow</a> for more details.</p>
<h5 id="notification-payload-2">Notification Payload</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>action</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>One of <code>"reservation_requested"</code>, <code>"reservation_request_voided".</code></span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>message_to_host</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>If the action is <code>"reservation_requested"</code>, this field will be included to represent the message from the guest that was sent with the request.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>reservation</code> <br> <i>object</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span><a href="/partner/api-docs/reservation-management/default#reservation-object">Reservation object</a></span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="example-notification-2">Example Notification</h5>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"action"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"reservation_requested"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"message_to_host"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"Can I book this listing?"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"reservation"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"booked_at"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"2018-09-21T03:52:25Z"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"updated_at"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"2018-09-21T03:52:25Z"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"cancellation_policy"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"cancel_strict_14_with_grace_period_grace_period"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"cancellation_policy_category"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"strict_14_with_grace_period"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="nt">"cancellation_policy"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"super_strict_30"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"confirmation_code"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"XEPATD"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"created_at"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"2018-09-21T03:39:55Z"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"end_date"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"2018-09-22"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">120</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"120.45"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"guest_details"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"localized_description"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"1 guest"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"number_of_adults"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"number_of_children"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"number_of_infants"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"guest_email"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"nick-owme5321y975kcat@guest.airbnb.com"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"guest_first_name"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"Nick"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"guest_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1603069</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"guest_last_name"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"Yu"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"guest_phone_numbers"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
       </span><span class="s2">"5555555555"</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">],</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"guest_preferred_locale"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"en"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"host_currency"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"USD"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"host_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">38836</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_base_price"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1136</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_base_price_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"1136.45"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_cancellation_host_fee"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_cancellation_host_fee_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"0.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_cancellation_payout"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_cancellation_payout_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"0.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_cleaning_fee"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_cleaning_fee_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"0"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_host_fee"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">34</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_host_fee_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"34.45"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">10816</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"nights"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"number_of_guests"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"occupancy_tax_amount_paid_to_host"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"occupancy_tax_amount_paid_to_host_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"0.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"special_offer_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"standard_fees_details"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[],</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"start_date"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"2016-02-01"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"status_type"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"accept"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"thread_id"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">435023593</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">121</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"120.50"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"transient_occupancy_tax_paid_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"transient_occupancy_tax_paid_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"20.45"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"transient_occupancy_tax_details"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w">  </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
       </span><span class="nt">"amount_usd"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w">  </span><span class="mf">10.45</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
       </span><span class="nt">"name"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w">  </span><span class="s2">"State Occupancy Tax"</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"amount_usd"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w">  </span><span class="mf">10.00</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
        </span><span class="nt">"name"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w">  </span><span class="s2">"City Lodging Tax"</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">]</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: Confirmed Reservation Notifications
sections.content:
<pre class="highlight text"><code>reservation_acceptance_confirmation
reservation_cancellation_confirmation
reservation_alteration_confirmation</code></pre>
<p>We notify the partners when a new reservation is confirmed, when a confirmed reservation is altered by guest or host, or the reservation is cancelled.</p>
<blockquote>NOTE: Reservation notifications are a critical element of the integration. We advise partners to perform a daily or weekly audit of all user reservations using the <a href="/partner/api-docs/reservation-management/default#retrieving-all-reservations">Reservations API</a> to make sure no reservations are missed.</blockquote>
<blockquote>NOTE: We might send several cancellation notifications for the same reservation because there are 3 different cancellation types (see <a href="/partner/api-docs/reservation-management/default#reservation-status">Reservation status</a>). We decided to notify the partner when reservation changes the cancellation type (even if it's already canceled) because a change from <code>cancelled_by_host</code> to <code>cancelled_by_admin</code> might result in a different payout amount. You can choose to ignore any additional cancelation notifications.</blockquote>
<h5 id="notification-payload-3">Notification Payload</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>action</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>One of <code>"reservation_acceptance_confirmation"</code>,  <code>"reservation_cancellation_confirmation"</code>,  <code>"reservation_alteration_confirmation"</code>, <code>"reservation_requested"</code>, <code>"reservation_request_voided".</code></span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>reservation</code> <br> <i>object</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span><a href="/partner/api-docs/reservation-management/default#reservation-object">Reservation object</a></span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<h5 id="example-notification-3">Example Notification</h5>

    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"120.45"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">

      </span><span class="nt">"number_of_adults"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"number_of_children"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
      </span><span class="nt">"number_of_infants"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="p">},</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"guest_email"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"nick-owme5321y975kcat@guest.airbnb.com"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">

sections.name: Payout Sent Notification
sections.content:
<pre class="highlight text"><code>payout_notification</code></pre>
<p>A notification is sent when we release payouts to hosts, which normally occurs approximately 24 hours after check-in. You can learn more details in the <a href="/partner/api-docs/reservation-management/default#payout-notification-scenarios">Payout Notifications section</a> in the Appendix.</p>
<h5 id="notification-payload-4">Notification Payload</h5>
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Field</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>action</code> <br> <i>string</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span><code>"payout_notification"</code></span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>confirmed_at</code> <br> <i>integer</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>A Unix timestamp.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>reservation</code> <br><i>object</i></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span><a href="/partner/api-docs/reservation-management/default#reservation-object">Reservation object</a></span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>

sections.name: Accepted Enum Values
Reservation Status
sections.content:
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Value</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>accept</code></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>An accepted reservation.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>deny</code></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The Host denied a pending reservation.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>pending</code></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Reservation is pending and calendar is blocked off. Will expire in less than 24hrs.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>timeout</code></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The Host did not answer in the allotted 24 hours; availability freed up.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>pending_voided</code></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The Guest retracted their request before the host had a chance to accept, or the guest fails to pay in the window given.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>pending_payment</code></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Sometimes sits between pending and accepted, where the host has expressed their intent to accept, but we still need to collect payment from the guest.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>cancelled_by_admin</code></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Cancelled by Airbnb admin.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>cancelled_by_host</code></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Cancelled by Host.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>cancelled_by_guest</code></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Cancelled by Guest.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>at_checkpoint</code></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The reservation request is on hold pending user verification.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>checkpoint_voided</code></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>The Guest failed to pass the checkpoint/verified ID tests.</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>

sections.name: Cancellation Policies
sections.content:
<div><table>
<thead><tr>
<th>
<span>Value</span><br>
</th>
<th>
<span>Description</span><br>
</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>"flexible"</code></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Full refund 1 day prior to arrival, except fees</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>"moderate"</code></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Full refund 5 days prior to arrival, except fees</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>"strict"</code></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>50% refund up until 1 week prior to arrival</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>"strict_14_with_grace_period"</code></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>Full refund within 48 hours of booking if before 14 days of checkin (up to 3 times a year for each guest). After, 50% refund up until 1 week prior to arrival</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>"super_strict_30"</code></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>50% refund up until 30 days prior to arrival, except fees</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<span><code>"super_strict_60"</code></span><br>
</td>
<td>
<span>50% refund up until 60 days prior to arrival, except fees</span><br>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>
<p>Policies with a <code>"_new"</code> suffix are only used in Italy. They include fees in refund. For example, <code>"super_strict_60"</code> in Italy is recognized as <code>"super_strict_60_new"</code>, 50% refund up until 60 days prior to arrival, including fees. Likewise for the other ones.</p>

sections.name: Appendix
Decimal Formatting for Accurate Fields
sections.content:
<p>Several reservation fields are now deprecated and replaced with new fields that can hold higher fidelity amounts. The new field values are JSON strings formatted with the recommended <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217">ISO-4217 exponent</a> corresponding to the currency. So, for example, US dollars are formatted as "123.45", whereas Japanese Yen are formatted as “123” (with zero decimal places). Similarly, currencies with larger exponents, like the Chilean Peso, are formatted as “123.4567”.</p>
<p>It is important when parsing these values to store them using a data type that preserves their precision. Be careful not to store them as float or double values as they might lose precision. Rather, use an <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arbitrary-precision_arithmetic">arbitrary precision decimal number.</a> Similar considerations apply when storing them in a database.</p>
<p>While the API will continue returning the deprecated fields, their values are unreliable. All API consumers should upgrade to the new fields immediately before the deprecated fields are removed.</p>

sections.name: Payout Details
sections.content:
<p>You can calculate the amount paid out in a normal reservation ( no cancellations or alterations)  using the following formula:</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>(listing_base_price_accurate + listing_cleaning_fee_accurate + standard_fees ) - listing_host_fee_accurate</code></pre>
<h5 id="detailed-cancellation-scenario">Detailed Cancellation Scenario</h5>
<p>See our <a href="https://www.airbnb.com/home/cancellation_policies">official cancellation policies</a> for further information</p>
<p>If the Host cancels, they do not receive any payout. If the Guest cancels (assuming a super_strict cancellation policy, with a 5% Host fee), the following scenarios apply.:</p>
<p>The Guest is refunded 50% if they cancel more than 30 days prior to the start date:</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>listing_cancellation_refund_accurate (to guest) = 
     listing_base_price_accurate * 50% + listing_cleaning_fee_accurate</code></pre>
<p>For example:  (<code>1200 * 0.5) + 100 = 700</code></p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>listing_cancellation_payout_before_fee_accurate (to host) = 
     listing_base_price_accurate - listing_cancellation_refund_accurate</code></pre>
<p>Example: <code>1200 - 700 = 600</code></p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>listing_cancellation_host_fee_accurate = 
     listing_cancellation_payout_1 * host_fee_percentage</code></pre>
<p>Example: <code>600 * 5% = 30</code></p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>listing_cancellation_payout_accurate = 
      listing_cancellation_payout_before_fee_accurate - listing_cancellation_host_fee_accurate</code></pre>
<p>Example: <code>600 - 30 = 570</code></p>
<p>If the Guest cancels less than 30 days from the start date, they pay 100% minus the cleaning fee:</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>listing_cancellation_refund_accurate = 
      listing_cleaning_fee_accurate($100) listing_cancellation_payout_before_fee_accurate 
      = listing_base_price_accurate listing_cancellation_host_fee_accurate 
      = listing_base_price_accurate * host_fee_percentage 
          listing_cancellation_payout_accurate 
      = listing_cancellation_payout_before_fee_accurate - 
          listing_cancellation_host_fee_accurate</code></pre>
<p>Note that any reservation longer than 28 days falls under our <a href="https://www.airbnb.com/home/cancellation_policies#long-term">long term booking policy</a>.</p>

sections.name: Payout Notification Scenarios
sections.content:
<p> In some cases, Partners could see multiple payout notifications:</p>
<div><ul>
<li>
<span>Long term reservations (trips longer than 30 days) are paid every 30 days. So the Partner receives multiple notifications until it’s fully paid.</span><br>
</li>
<li>
<span>Reservation is altered/canceled after it’s paid. In this case, we have already sent out payout notification once before the alteration is confirmed. The Partner receives a second payout notification when the additional adjustment is settled. The Partner will already have been notified about the alteration/cancellation via the reservation webhook.</span><br>
</li>
<li>
<span>Bank transfer error. Releasing a payout does not necessarily guarantee a successful bank deposit, though this kind of failure is rare (less than 1%). On our end, we undo the payout release, notify the Host to set up correct payout information, and retry after they have done so. In this case, the Partner receives two additional notifications: one to update them about the failure so they know the reservation is not paid because of an error, then another to update them that the reservation is eventually paid out.</span><br>
</li>
</ul></div>
<p>Partners should keep track of multiple notification events. Since a notification can also fail due to server downtime and be retried,  a <code>confirmed_at</code> timestamp is provided for each notification so you can distinguish between a legitimate update and a retry.</p>
<h5 id="short-term-reservation">Short-Term Reservation</h5>
<p><b>Scenario 1</b> (most common case): Short-term reservation ($120) successfully paid in one release—no alteration, no bank error. The partner receives the following example notification after the payout is released, usually 24 hours after guest check in.</p>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"metadata"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{},</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"reservation"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"confirmation_code"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"ABCDE"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"host_currency"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"USD"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">120</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"120.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">120</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"120.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="err">...</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="err">}</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"action"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"payout_notification"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"confirmed_at"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">123456789</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="long-term-reservation">Long-Term Reservation</h5>
<p><b>Scenario 2</b> (long-term reservation): Long-term reservation (75 days, $15,000) successfully paid in 3 releases, $6,000, $6,000, and $3,000. The Partner receives the following example notifications, one every 30 days, until it’s paid in full.</p>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"metadata"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{},</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"reservation"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"confirmation_code"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"ABCDE"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"host_currency"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"USD"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">15000</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"15000.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">6000</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"6000.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="err">...</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="err">}</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"action"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"payout_notification"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"confirmed_at"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">123456000</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"metadata"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{},</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"reservation"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"confirmation_code"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"ABCDE"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"host_currency"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"USD"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">15000</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"15000.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">    
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">12000</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"12000.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="err">...</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="err">}</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"action"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"payout_notification"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"confirmed_at"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">123459000</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"metadata"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{},</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"reservation"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"confirmation_code"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"ABCDE"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"host_currency"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"USD"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">15000</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"15000.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">15000</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"15000.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="err">...</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="err">}</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"action"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"payout_notification"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"confirmed_at"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">123459999</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="reservation-alteration">Reservation Alteration</h5>
<p><b>Scenario 3</b> (reservation alteration): The reservation is altered after it’s paid. The expected payout changed from $900 to $600, and the Host gets an adjustment of $300. Before the alteration, the Partners see the first notification:</p>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"metadata"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{},</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"reservation"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"confirmation_code"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"ABCDE"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"host_currency"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"USD"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">900</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"900.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">900</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"900.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="err">...</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="err">}</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"action"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"payout_notification"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"confirmed_at"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">123456000</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>
<p>The Partner receives the alteration notification via the reservations webhook, so they should expect another payout notification. The payout notification is sent during the next payout cycle:</p>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"metadata"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{},</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"reservation"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"confirmation_code"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"ABCDE"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"host_currency"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"USD"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">600</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"600.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">600</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"600.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="err">...</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="err">}</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"action"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"payout_notification"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"created_at"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">123459000</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="bank-account-error">Bank Account Error</h5>
<p><b>Scenario 4 </b>(bank account error, very rare case): The reservation is paid at payout release ($1,200) but later the release doesn’t go through because there was an error in the bank account. The Partner first sees the payout confirmation:</p>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"metadata"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{},</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"reservation"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"confirmation_code"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"ABCDE"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"host_currency"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"USD"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1200</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"1200.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1200</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"1200.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="err">...</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="err">}</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"action"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"payout_notification"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"confirmed_at"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">123456000</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>
<p>The Partner is then notified about the error. In the same time we also notify the host about the error and prompt them to set up correct payout info.</p>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"metadata"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{},</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"reservation"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"confirmation_code"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"ABCDE"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"host_currency"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"USD"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1200</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"1200,00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"0.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="err">...</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="err">}</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"action"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"payout_notification"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"confirmed_at"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">123459000</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>
<p>Finally, once the host sets up the correct payout info, we deliver the payout and the associated notification:</p>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"metadata"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{},</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"reservation"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"confirmation_code"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"ABCDE"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"host_currency"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"USD"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1200</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"1200.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1200</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"1200.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="err">...</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="err">}</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"action"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"payout_notification"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"confirmed_at"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">123459999</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>
<h5 id="occupancy-tax-host-remittance-in-payout-notification">Occupancy Tax Host Remittance in Payout Notification</h5>
<p>In certain markets, listings are subject to <b>Occupancy Tax Remittance</b>. All reservations on the listings in eligible markets will have Local Occupancy Taxes automatically calculated and added as a line-item to the guest. We work with a third party to calculate these local taxes; hosts cannot specify their own amounts.  </p>
<p> An example payout notification:</p>
<p>After reservation accepted, and before payout released:</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>listing_base_price_accurate = expected_payout_amount_accurate + listing_host_fee_accurate</code></pre>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"metadata"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{},</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"reservation"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"confirmation_code"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"ABCDE"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"host_currency"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"USD"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_base_price"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1740</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_base_price_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"1740.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_host_fee"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">90</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_host_fee_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"90.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1650</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"1650.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"0.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"occupancy_tax_amount_paid_to_host"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"occupancy_tax_amount_paid_to_host_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"0.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="err">...</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="err">}</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"action"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"payout_notification"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"confirmed_at"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">123459999</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>
<p>After reservation is paid in full:</p>
<pre class="highlight text"><code>listing_base_price_accurate = total_paid_amount_accurate + listing_host_fee_accurate
total_paid_amount_accurate + occupancy_tax_amount_paid_to_host_accurate = total amount we paid to host</code></pre>
<pre class="highlight json"><code><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"metadata"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{},</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"reservation"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"confirmation_code"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"ABCDE"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"host_currency"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"USD"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_base_price"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1740</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_base_price_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"1740.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_host_fee"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">90</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"listing_host_fee_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"90.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1650</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"expected_payout_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"1650.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1650</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"total_paid_amount_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"1650.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"occupancy_tax_amount_paid_to_host"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">87</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="nt">"occupancy_tax_amount_paid_to_host_accurate"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"87.00"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
    </span><span class="err">...</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="err">}</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"action"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">"payout_notification"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w">
  </span><span class="nt">"confirmed_at"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">123459999</span><span class="w">
</span><span class="p">}</span></code></pre>

sections.name: FAQ
sections.content:
<p><b>Are all reservation statuses used in online booking flow? E.g. pending, timeout, deny, at_checkpoint?</b></p>
<p>We send the acceptance confirmations once the reservations are confirmed. You might see these intermediary statuses when you query the Reservations API.</p>
<p><b>Is it possible for an API Partner to query all reservations associated with their Host clients, or do they have to query at the listing/Host level?</b></p>
<p>The query must be at the Host level.</p>
<h5 id="document-feedback">Document Feedback</h5>
<p>If you have any feedback on this document, please let us know. We are always interested in learning how we can improve the documentation and the reader's experience. <annotation>Please submit your feedback through the <a href="https://airbnb.secure.force.com/contactus/APICaseForm">API Technical Support Request Form</a>.</annotation></p>
